entry.title: Khovanov homology of links in I-bundles over surfaces
entry.summary: The papers math.QA/0403527 and math.QA/0409414 v.1 are now merged together. The final version is available at math.QA/0409414 v.2. To avoid duplication of papers, math.QA/0403527 is now removed.
entry.arxiv:comment: The papers math.QA/0403527 and math.QA/0409414 v.1 are now merged together. The final version is available at math.QA/0409414 v.2. To avoid duplication of papers, math.QA/0403527 is removed

entry.title: Remarks on topological algebras
entry.summary: The note complements topological aspects of the theory of chiral algebras.

entry.title: The FRT-dual U(O(G_q) \bowtie O(G_q)) and the q-Lorentz Algebra
entry.summary: Withdrawn due to a gap in the proof of the main result. A corrected version is available as math.QA/0210203

entry.title: Twisted cyclic cohomology of the quantum SU(2)
entry.summary: Withdrawn. Generalized and subsumed by math.QA/0405249
entry.arxiv:comment: Withdrawn. Generalized and subsumed by math.QA/0405249

entry.title: Quantum groups: from Kulish-Reshetikhin discovery to classification
entry.summary: The aim of this paper is to provide an overview of the results about classification of quantum groups that were obtained in arXiv:1303.4046 [math.QA] and arXiv:1502.00403 [math.QA].

entry.title: An invariant of tangle cobordisms
entry.summary: We prove that the construction of our previous paper math.QA/0103190 yields an invariant of tangle cobordisms.

entry.title: On Function Theory in Quantum Disc: q-Differential Equations and Fourier Transform
entry.summary: This work presents proofs of the main results of (math.QA/9808015), except those on q-Berezin transform to appear in a subsequent work. The notation and the results of (math.QA/9808037) and (math.QA/9808047) are used.

entry.title: Calculating zeros of a q-zeta function numerically
entry.summary: The note is a continuation of the previous paper ``On q-analogues of Riemann's zeta'' (math.QA/980499). It contains an output of the computer program calculating the zeros of the ``sharp'' q-zeta function.

entry.title: What is moonshine?
entry.summary: This is an informal write up of my talk in Berlin. It gives some background to Goddard's talk (math.QA/9808136) about the moonshine conjectures.
entry.arxiv:journal_ref: Doc. Math. J. DMV, Extra volume ICM 1998 vol 1, p. 607-616

entry.title: Deformation quantization with traces and vanishing of the wheels
entry.summary: The paper has been withdrawn because the result of math.QA/0002057 "Deformation quantization with traces" holds only for a constant volume form.

entry.title: Quantum cluster algebras: Oberwolfach talk, February 2005
entry.summary: This is an extended abstract of my talk at the Oberwolfach-Workshop "Representation Theory of Finite-Dimensional Algebras" (February 6 - 12, 2005). It gives self-contained and simplified definitions of quantum cluster algebras introduced and studied in a joint work with A.Berenstein (math.QA/0404446).

entry.title: On the Hecke algebras and the colored HOMFLY polynomial
entry.summary: This paper has been withdrawn since it is identical to the paper math.QA/0601267. It was posted by mistake.

entry.title: Applications of Crystal Bases to Current Problems in Representation Theory
entry.summary: This dissertation addresses several current problems in Representation Theory using crystal bases. It incorporates the results of arXiv:math.QA/0408113 and arXiv:math.RT/0603547, as well as previously unpublished results.

entry.title: The Kashiwara-Vergne conjecture
entry.summary: This is a Bourbaki's seminar text. We introduce the combinatorial Kashiwara-Vergne conjecture on the Baker-Campbell-Hausdorff serie. After recalling previous results and consequences, we explain the Alekseev-Meinrenken's proof [math.QA/0506499]

entry.title: On Function Theory in Quantum Disc: Invariant Kernels
entry.summary: In our earlier work math.QA/9808015 some results on integral representations of functions in quantum disc were announced. It was then shown in math.QA/9808037 that the validity of those results is related to the invariance of kernels of some integral operators. We introduce here a method which allows us to prove the invariance of the above kernels.

entry.title: Generalized twisted coHom objects
entry.summary: A generalization of the concept of twisted internal coHom object in the category of conic quantum spaces (c.f. math.QA/0112233) was outlined in math.QA/0202205. The aim of this article is to discuss in more detail this generalization.

entry.title: On Hopf algebras of dimension pq
entry.summary: In this paper we contribute to the classification of Hopf algebras of dimension pq, where p,q are distinct prime numbers. More precisely, we prove that if p and q are odd primes with p<q<2p+3, then any complex Hopf algebra of dimension pq is semisimple and hence isomorphic to either a group algebra or to the dual of a group algebra by the previous works math.QA/9801129 and math.QA/9801128.

entry.title: Erratum to: "A Proof of Tsygan's Formality Conjecture for an Arbitrary Smooth Manifold"
entry.summary: Boris Shoikhet noticed that the proof of lemma 1 in section 2.3 of math.QA/0504420 contains an error. In this note I give a correct proof of this lemma which was suggested to me by Dmitry Tamarkin. The correction does not change the results of math.QA/0504420.

entry.title: On the signature of certain intersection forms
entry.summary: We prove a conjecture of Zuber on the signature of intersection froms associated with affine algebras of type A.

entry.title: The Two-Dimensional Quantum Galilei Groups
entry.summary: The Poisson structures on two-dimensional Galilei group, classified in the author previous paper are quantized. The dual quantum Galilei Lie algebras are found.

entry.title: Quantum Galois theory for compact Lie groups
entry.summary: We establish a quantum Galois correspondence for compact Lie groups of automorphisms acting on a simple vertex operator algebra.

entry.title: Operator Representations of a q-Deformed Heisenberg Algebra
entry.summary: A class of well-behaved *-representations of a q-deformed Heisenberg algebra is studied and classified.

entry.title: Solutions of the Yang-Baxter equation and quantum sl(2)
entry.summary: We construct a quantum deformation of a family of the Yang-Baxter equation solutions naturally arising from a Lie algebra sl(2).

entry.title: A modular invariance on the theta functions defined on vertex operator algebras
entry.summary: We introduce theta-functions of VOA-modules and show that the space spanned by them has a modular invariance property.

entry.title: Functorial properties of the hypergeometric map
entry.summary: The quantized Knizhnik-Zamolodchikov equation is a difference equation defined in terms of rational $R$ matrices. We describe all singularities of hypergeometric solutions to the qKZ equations.

entry.title: A braid group representation derived from handlebodies
entry.summary: We define an action of Artin's braid group on a finite dimensional algebra.

entry.title: Corrections to the book ``Vertex algebras for beginners'', second edition, by Victor Kac
entry.summary: These are corrections to the second edition of the book ``Vertex algebras for beginners'', University Lecture Series, 10, American Mathematical Society, Providence, RI, 1998.

entry.title: Cosovereign Hopf algebras
entry.summary: In this paper we define and study the algebraic conterpart of sovereign monoidal categories : cosovereign Hopf algebras.

entry.title: Formality conjecture for chains
entry.summary: We state the analogs of Kontsevich's formality conjecture for Hochschild and cyclic chains, as well as their

entry.title: Doi-Hopf Modules over Weak Hopf Algebras
entry.summary: The theory of Doi-Hopf modules is generalized to Weak Hopf algebras.

entry.title: Manin triples of real simple Lie algebras. Part 2
entry.summary: We classify Manin triples of the type $(g(R),W,g(R)\oplus g(R))$ up to weak and gauge equivalence.

entry.title: Two-Dimensional Centrally Extended Quantum Galilei Groups and their Algebras
entry.summary: All deformations of two dimensional centrally extended Galilei group are classified. The corresponding quantum Lie algebras are found.

entry.title: Semi-affine Coxeter-Dynkin graphs and $G \subseteq SU_2(C)$
entry.summary: These graphs generalize both affine and finite type and provide an explanation for some quantum properties of roots of unity.

entry.title: Fusion rules for the free bosonic orbifold vertex operator algebra
entry.summary: Fusion rules among irreducible modules of the free bosonic orbifold vertex operator algebra are completely determined.

entry.title: Deformation Quantization of Kahler Manifolds
entry.summary: We present an explicit formula for the deformation quantization on K\"{a}hler manifolds.

entry.title: Sur les integrales de mouvement du systeme de sinus-Gordon sur reseau
entry.summary: Cet artice donne des formules explicites pour des densites d'integrales de mouvement du systeme de sinus-Gordon sur reseau.

entry.title: Note on the Ruijsenaars-Schneider model
entry.summary: We study vector bundles with some additional structures on an elliptic curve and show how there are related to the elliptic Ruijsenaars-Schneider model.

entry.title: Twisted Crystalline Differential Operators
entry.summary: This paper has been withdrawn by the authors.

entry.title: Semiinfinite cohomology of Tate Lie algebras
entry.summary: In this note we give a definition of semiinfinite cohomology for Tate Lie algebras using the language of Differential Graded Lie algebroids with Curvature (CDG Lie algebroids).

entry.title: One-dimensional double Hecke algebras and Gaussians
entry.summary: We use one-dimensional double affine Hecke algebras to introduce q-counterparts of the Gauss integrals and new types of Gauss-Selberg sums at roots of unity.

entry.title: Fusion rules for the charge conjugation orbifold
entry.summary: We completely determine the fusion rules for the vertex operator algebra $V_L^+$ for a rank one even lattice $L$.

entry.title: Poisson-Lie structures on Galilei group
entry.summary: The complete list of Poisson-Lie structures on 4-d Galilei group is presented.

entry.title: A matrix model for quantum SL_2
entry.summary: We describe a topological ribbon Hopf algebra whose elements are sequences of matrices. The algebra is a quantum version of U(sl_2).

entry.title: Remarks on quantum transmutation
entry.summary: It is shown how formulas of the author for general operator transmutation can be adapted to a quantum group context

entry.title: Vertex operator algebras and the representation theory of toroidal algebras
entry.summary: An explicit vertex operator algebra construction is given of a class of irreducible modules for toroidal Lie algebras.

entry.title: The charge conjugation orbifold $V_{Zα}^{+}$ is rational when $<α,α>/2$ is prime
entry.summary: We prove that the vertex operator algebra $V_{Z\alpha}^{+}$ is rational if $<\alpha,\alpha>/2$ is a prime integer.

entry.title: Discretization and Moyal brackets
entry.summary: We give a q-analysis version of a discretization procedure of Kemmoku and Saito leading to an apparently new q-Moyal type bracket.

entry.title: The integral representations of the q-Bessel-Macdonald functions
entry.summary: The q-Bessel-Macdonald functions of kinds 1, 2 and 3 are considered. Their representations by classical integral are constructed.

entry.title: Rieffel's deformation quantization and isospectral deformations
entry.summary: We demonstrate the relation between the isospectral deformation and Rieffel's deformation quantization by the action of $\R^d$.

entry.title: Some examples of classical coboundary Lie bialgebras with coboundary duals
entry.summary: Some examples are given of finite dimensional Lie bialgebras whose brackets and cobrackets are determined by pairs of $r$-matrices.

entry.title: An Integral PBW Basis of the Quantum Affine Algebra of Type A$_{2}^{(2)}$
entry.summary: We construct an integral PBW basis and an integral crystal basis of the quantum affine algebra of type A$_{2}^{(2)}$.

entry.title: Bosonic formulas for $\hat{sl_2}$ coinvariants
entry.summary: We derive bosonic-type formulas for the characters of $\hat{sl_2}$ coinvariants.

entry.title: Differential geometry of the q-quaternion
entry.summary: Differential calculus on the quantum quaternionic group GL(1,H$_q$) is introduced.

entry.title: An algorithm for computing the global basis of an irreducible $U_{q}(sp_{2n})$-module
entry.summary: We describe a simple algorithm for computing the canonical basis of any finite-dimensional $U_{q}(sp_{2n})$-module.

entry.title: Realizations of Crystals
entry.summary: We shall give various realizations of crystals. One of them is a monome realization introduced by Nakajima.

entry.title: Langlands parameters for Heisenberg modules
entry.summary: We show that any module over a Heisenberg Lie algebra is an "integral" over the space of local systems for the dual torus of modules over twisted Heisenberg lattice vertex algebras

entry.title: A quasi-Hopf algebra freeness theorem
entry.summary: We prove the quasi-Hopf algebra version of the Nichols-Zoeller theorem: A finite-dimensional quasi-Hopf algebra is free over any quasi-Hopf subalgebra.

entry.title: Cosemisimple Hopf algebras with antipode of arbitrary finite order
entry.summary: We show that there exists cosemisimple Hopf algebras of arbitrary finite even order. We also discuss the Schur indicator for such Hopf algebras.

entry.title: Simple vertex operator algebras are nondegenerate
entry.summary: In this paper it is shown that every irreducible vertex algebra of countable dimension and every simple vertex operator algebra are nondegenerate in the sense of Etingof and Kazhdan.

entry.title: Quotients of finite quasi-Hopf algebras
entry.summary: Let H be a finite-dimensional quasi-Hopf algebra. We show for each quotient quasibialgebra Q of H that Q is a quasi-Hopf algebra whose dimension divides the dimension of H.

entry.title: Coassociativity breaking and oriented graphs
entry.summary: This paper is an attempt to unify coassociative coalgebra theory and random walks on oriented graphs.

entry.title: Quaternionic quasideterminants and determinants
entry.summary: We compute quaisideterminants and determinants of quaternionic matrices

entry.title: Quantum torsors and Hopf-Galois objects
entry.summary: We prove that every faithfully flat Hopf-Galois object is a quantum torsor in the sense of Grunspan.

entry.title: Elliptic Selberg integrals and conformal blocks
entry.summary: We present an elliptic version of Selberg's integral formula.

entry.title: Corepresentation theory of universal cosovereign Hopf algebras
entry.summary: We determine the corepresentation theory of universal cosovereign Hopf algebras, for generic matrices over an algebraically closed field of characteristic zero.

entry.title: Deformation Quantization of Endomorphism Bundles
entry.summary: In this preprint the notion of deformation quantization of endomorphism bundles over symplectic manifolds is defined and developed, including index theory.

entry.title: The Schaper Formula and the Lascoux, Leclerc and Thibon-algorithm
entry.summary: We deduce the Schaper formula for Hecke-algebras at root of unity from the Jantzen conjecture in the LLT-setup. This explains an observation due to R. Rouquier.

entry.title: Remarks on q-Virasoro and qKdV
entry.summary: Some forms of qKdV type equations are indicated which arise from Virasoro considerations.
entry.arxiv:comment: 10 pages, Latex, some typos corrected, remark added

entry.title: Geometric Crystals on Schubert Varieties
entry.summary: We define geometric crystals and unipotent crystals for arbitrary Kac-Moody groups and describe geometric and unipotent crystal structures on the Schubert varieties.

entry.title: On quasi-Poisson homogeneous spaces of quasi-Poisson Lie groups
entry.summary: We provide a quasi-Poisson version of the Drinfeld's correspondence between Poisson homogeneous spaces and Lagrangian subalgebras.

entry.title: Toward a canonical qKdV equation
entry.summary: A new construction, with more visible canonical features, of a qKdV equation in a q-Virasoro context is exhibited.

entry.title: An explicit deformation theory of (co)associative bialgebras
entry.summary: The paper has been withdrawn.

entry.title: Noncommutative Hypergeometry
entry.summary: A certain special function of the generalized hypergeometric variety is shown to fulfill a host of useful noncommutative identities.

entry.title: Families of Hopf algebras of trees and pre-Lie algebras
entry.summary: Using methods from math-ph/9907010, we study families of Hopf algebra structures on coloured trees.

entry.title: Structure theory of finite Lie conformal superalgebras
entry.summary: We develop structure theory of finite Lie conformal superalgebras.

entry.title: On a theorem of Conant-Vogtmann
entry.summary: We prove that the graph complex is a strong homotopy Lie (super) bialgebra.

entry.title: Twisted Hochschild Homology of Quantum Hyperplanes
entry.summary: We calculate the Hochschild dimension of quantum hyperplanes using the twisted Hochschild homology.

entry.title: The q-binomial formula and the Rogers dilogarithm identity
entry.summary: The q-binomial formula in the limit q->1 is shown to be equivalent to the Rogers five term dilogarithm identity.

entry.title: Selberg Integrals
entry.summary: The paper is written for Kluwer's Encyclopaedia of Mathematics.

entry.title: Quantum Groups and Bounded Symmetric Domains
entry.summary: Recent results of the authors on quantum bounded symmetric domains and quantum Harish-Chandra modules are expounded.

entry.title: A Counter Example of Invariant Deformation Quantization
entry.summary: In this note, we will show one example of hamiltonian Lie algebra action which has no invariant star product.

entry.title: Introduction to Hopf-Cyclic Cohomology
entry.summary: We review the recent progress in the study of cyclic cohomology in the presence of Hopf symmetry.

entry.title: Moyal quantization of necklace Lie algebras
entry.summary: We use Moyal-type formulas to construct a Hopf algebra quantization of the necklace Lie bialgebra associated with a quiver.

entry.title: Symmetrization of Brace Algebras
entry.summary: We show that the symmetrization of a brace algebra structure yields the structure of a symmetric brace algebra.

entry.title: Pre-modular categories of rank 3
entry.summary: We classify ribbon semisimple monoidal categories with three isomorphism classes of simple objects over the field of complex numbers.

entry.title: On Braided Groupoids
entry.summary: We study and give examples of braided groupoids, and, a fortiori, non-degenerate solutions of the quiver-theoretical braid equation.

entry.title: On the polar decomposition of circular variables
entry.summary: We find an elementary proof for Voiculescu's theorem on the polar decomposition of circular variables.

entry.title: The bicrossed product construction for locally compact quantum groups
entry.summary: The cocycle bicrossed product construction allows certain freedom in producing examples of locally compact quantum groups. We give an overview of some recent examples of this kind having remarkable properties.

entry.title: Drinfeld double for orbifolds
entry.summary: We prove that the Drinfeld double of the category of sheaves on an orbifold is equivalent to the category of sheves on the corresponding inertia orbifold.

entry.title: Uniqueness of quantization of complex contact manifolds
entry.summary: Using the language of algebroid stacks, we will show that Kashiwara's quantization of a complex contact manifold is unique.

entry.title: BC_N-graded Lie algebras arising from fermionic representations
entry.summary: We use fermionic representations to obtain a class of BC$_{{}_{\text N}}$-graded Lie algebras coordinatized by quantum tori with nontrivial central extensions.

entry.title: Deformation of dual Leibniz algebra morphisms
entry.summary: An algebraic deformation theory of morphisms of dual Leibniz algebras is obtained.
entry.arxiv:comment: 10 pages. To appear in Communications in Algebra

entry.title: Deformations of coalgebra morphisms
entry.summary: An algebraic deformation theory of coalgebra morphisms is constructed.
entry.arxiv:comment: 10 pages. To appear in Journal of Algebra

entry.title: Algebraic Deformation Quantization
entry.summary: This paper has been withdrawn

entry.title: An explicit formula for a strong connection
entry.summary: An explicit formula for a strong connection form in a principal extension by a coseparable coalgebra is given.

entry.title: Ar-Quiver Approach to Affine Canonical Basis Elements
entry.summary: We describe the affine canonical basis elements in the case when the affine quiver has arbitrary orientation. This generalizes Lusztig's description.

entry.title: $A^{N}_{\infty}$-algebras
entry.summary: We study higher depth algebras. We introduce several examples of such structures starting from the notion of $N$-differential graded algebras and build up to the concept of $A_{\infty}^N$-algebras.

entry.title: Quantum Groups and Twisted Spectral Triples
entry.summary: Through the example of the quantum symplectic 4-sphere, we discuss how the notion of twisted spectral triple fits into the framework of quantum homogeneous spaces.

entry.title: On right coideal subalgebras
entry.summary: Let $H$ be a character Hopf algebra. Every right coideal subalgebra that contains the coradical has a PBW-basis which can be extended up to a PBW-basis of $H.$

entry.title: How to disentangle two braided Hopf algebras
entry.summary: We show how to define the tensor product of two braided Hopf algebras.

entry.title: Comment on the article arXiv 0710.0349 by Chapoton et al. titled ``An operational calculus for the Mould operad''
entry.summary: This paper has been withdrawn.

entry.title: On dual quadri-algebras
entry.summary: This paper has been withdrawn

entry.title: A simple algorithm for extending the identities for quantum minors to the multiparametric case
entry.summary: For any homogeneous identity between $q$-minors, we provide an identity between $P,Q$-minors.

entry.title: Hopf Algebroids
entry.summary: This is a preprint version of a chapter for Handbook of Algebra.
entry.arxiv:comment: Preprint version of a chapter for Handbook of Algebra, 44 pages

entry.title: Formality of cyclic cochains
entry.summary: We prove Kontsevich's cyclic formality conjecture.
entry.arxiv:comment: with a section by Damien Calaque

entry.title: Matrix Corepresentations for SL_q(N) and SU_q(N)
entry.summary: We give an algorithm for computing matrix corepresentations for special linear and special unitary quantum groups using a combinatorial re-indexing of basis elements.

entry.title: W-algebras related to parafermion algebras
entry.summary: We study a W-algebra of central charge 2(k-1)/(k+2) with k a positive integer greater than 1

entry.title: Formality for algebroid stacks
entry.summary: We extend the formality theorem of M. Kontsevich from deformations of the structure sheaf on a manifold to deformations of gerbes.

entry.title: The $q$-Onsager algebra
entry.summary: This article gives a summary of the finite-dimesional irreducible representations of the $q$-Onsager algebra, which are treated in detail in our paper `The augmented tridiagonal algebra'.

entry.title: Some dendriform functors
entry.summary: We make a first step towards categorification of the dendriform operad, using categories of modules over the Tamari lattices. This means that we describe some functors that correspond to part of the operad structure.

entry.title: Addendum to: "Constructing quantized enveloping algebras via inverse limits of finite dimensional algebras"
entry.summary: It is shown that the question raised in Section 5.7 of [1] has an affirmative answer.

entry.title: Semisimple Hopf algebras of dimension 60
entry.summary: We determine the isomorphism classes of semisimple Hopf algebras of dimension 60 which are simple as Hopf algebras.

entry.title: Isomorphisms between Two Quantized Enveloping Algebras of the Same Type
entry.summary: The paper has been withdrawn.

entry.title: On the classification of Galois objects for finite groups
entry.summary: We classify Galois objects for the dual of a group algebra of a finite group over an arbitrary field.

entry.title: Three dimensional real Lie bialgebras
entry.summary: We classify all real three dimensional Lie bialgebras. In each case, their automorphism group as Lie bialgebras is also given.

entry.title: One-point functions over elliptic curves
entry.summary: This paper has been withdrawn.

entry.title: R-smash products of Hopf quasigroups
entry.summary: The theory of R-smash products for Hopf quasigroups is developed.
entry.arxiv:comment: 10 pages; to appear in AJSE D-Mathematics

entry.title: On braided near-group categories
entry.summary: We prove that any fusion category over $\mathbb{C}$ with exactly one non-invertible simple object is spherical. Furthermore, we classify all such categories that come equipped with a braiding.

entry.title: Pentagon Identity Revisited I
entry.summary: This is to present a previously overlooked q-analog of the five-term dilogarithm relation.

entry.title: Associating quantum vertex algebras to certain deformed Heisenberg Lie algebras
entry.summary: We associate quantum vertex algebras and their $\phi$-coordinated quasi modules to certain deformed Heisenberg algebras.
entry.arxiv:comment: 23 pages; to appear in Frontiers of Mathematics in China

entry.title: Structure of root graded Lie algebras
entry.summary: We give a complete description of Lie algebras graded by an infinite irreducible locally finite root system.

entry.title: Lusztig's $a$ function for Coxeter groups of rank 3
entry.summary: We show that Lusztig's $a$-function of a Coxeter group is bounded if the rank of the Coxeter group is 3.

entry.title: Thermodynamics and the moment map
entry.summary: We give a thermodynamical interpretation of the moment map for toric varieties.

entry.title: A Hochschild's 6-term exact sequence for restricted Lie superalgebras
entry.summary: In [5], Hochschild established a 6-term exact sequence for the cohomology of restricted Lie algebras. We generalize this result to restricted Lie superalgebras.

entry.title: Quantum groups via Hall algebras of complexes
entry.summary: We describe quantum enveloping algebras of symmetric Kac-Moody Lie algebras via a finite field Hall algebra construction involving Z_2-graded complexes of quiver representations.

entry.title: Central Extensions of Root Graded Lie Algebras
entry.summary: We study the central extensions of Lie algebras graded by an irreducible locally finite root system.

entry.title: Drinfeld-Jimbo quantum Lie algebra
entry.summary: Quantum Lie algebras related to multi-parametric Drinfeld-Jimbo $R$-matrices of type $GL(m|n)$ are classified.

entry.title: Quillen's work on the foundations of cyclic cohomology
entry.summary: We give a survey of Quillen's contributions, apart from the very first joint paper with Loday, to the area of cyclic homology.

entry.title: Classification of Ising vectors in the vertex operator algebra $V_L^+$
entry.summary: Let $L$ be an even lattice without roots. In this article, we classify all Ising vectors in the vertex operator algebra $V_L^+$ associated with $L$.

entry.title: Grothendieck-Teichmueller group and Poisson cohomologies
entry.summary: We study actions of the Grothendieck-Teichm\"uller group GRT on Poisson cohomologies of Poisson manifolds.

entry.title: Dedekind η-function and quantum groups
entry.summary: We realize some powers of Dedekind $\eta$-function as traces on quantum coordinate algebras.

entry.title: Deformation Quantization of A-infinity Equivalences
entry.summary: We show that Deformation Quantization of quadratic Poisson structures preserves the $A_\infty$-Morita equivalence of a given pair of Koszul dual $A_\infty$-algebras.

entry.title: On the classification of finite dimensional irreducible modules for affine BMW algebras
entry.summary: In this paper, we classify the finite dimensional irreducible modules for affine BMW algebra over an algebraically closed field with arbitrary characteristic.

entry.title: A note on Bridgeland's Hall algebra of two-periodic complexes
entry.summary: We show that the Hall algebra of two-periodic complexes, which is recently introduced by T.Bridgeland, coincides with the Drinfeld double of the ordinary Hall bialgebra.

entry.title: On the Ado Theorem for finite Lie conformal algebras with Levi decomposition
entry.summary: We prove that a finite torsion-free conformal Lie algebra with a splitting solvable radical has a finite faithful conformal representation.

entry.title: Noncommutative Minimal Surfaces
entry.summary: We define noncommutative minimal surfaces in the Weyl algebra, and give a method to construct them by generalizing the well-known Weierstrass-representation.

entry.title: BLM realization for Frobenius--Lusztig Kernels of type A
entry.summary: The infinitesimal quantum $\frak{gl}_n$ was realized in \cite[\S 6]{BLM}. We will realize Frobenius--Lusztig Kernels of type $A$ in this paper.

entry.title: Comodule Hom-coalgebras
entry.summary: We introduce the concept of comodule Hom-coalgebras and show that comodule Hom-coalgebras can be deformed from comodule coalgebras via endomorphisms.

entry.title: On quantization of quasi-Lie bialgebras
entry.summary: We modify the quantization of Etingof and Kazhdan so that it can be used to quantize quasi-Lie bialgebras.

entry.title: Can we quantize Galois theory ?
entry.summary: We present a non-linear difference-differential equation whoes Galois group is a non-commutative and non-co-comutative Hopf algebra.

entry.title: Poisson-Gerstenhaber brackets in representation algebras
entry.summary: We introduce cyclic bilinear forms on coalgebras and use them to generalize Van den Bergh's Poisson brackets in representation algebras.

entry.title: Fusion rules for the vertex operator algebra $V_{L_{2}}^{A_{4}}$
entry.summary: The fusion rules for vertex operator algebra $V_{L_{2}}^{A_{4}}$ are determined.

entry.title: Affine cellularity of S_triangle(2,2)
entry.summary: In this paper we prove that the affine Schur algebra $\s$ is affine cellular over $\bbq$. As an application, we prove it is of finite global dimension.

entry.title: Formal symplectic geometry for Leibniz algebras
entry.summary: We study a formal symplectic geometry for anticyclic Leibniz operad and its Koszul dual operad.

entry.title: Affine cellularity of affine Birman-Murakami-Wenzl algebras
entry.summary: We show that the affine BMW algebras are affine cellular algebras.
entry.arxiv:comment: Comments are welcome. arXiv admin note: substantial text overlap with arXiv:0801.0306 by other authors

entry.title: Affine cellularity of affine Brauer algebras
entry.summary: We show that the affine Brauer algebras are affine cellular algebras in the sense of Koenig and Xi.

entry.title: Decomposition matrices of Birman-Murakami-Wenzl algebras
entry.summary: In this paper, we calculate decomposition matrices of the Birman-Murakami-Wenzl algebras over $\mathbb C$.

entry.title: A categorification of twisted Heisenberg algebras
entry.summary: We categorify a quantized Heisenberg algebra associated to a finite subgroup of SL(2,C).

entry.title: Examples of extensions of Hopf algebras
entry.summary: We give some examples of, and raise some questions on, extensions of semisimple Hopf algebras.
entry.arxiv:comment: 15 pages, to appear in Revista Colombiana de Matem\'aticas (2015)

entry.title: Models for the n-Swiss Cheese operads
entry.summary: We describe combinatorial Hopf (co-)operadic models for the Swiss Cheese operads built from Feynman diagrams. This extends previous work of Kontsevich and Lambrechts-Voli\'c for the little disks operads.

entry.title: Quotients and Hopf Images of a Smash Coproduct
entry.summary: We describe the Hopf algebra quotients and Hopf images of the smash coproduct of a group algebra by the algebra of functions on a finite group.

entry.title: Braided $\mathbb{Z}_q$-extensions of pointed fusion categories
entry.summary: We classify braided $\mathbb{Z}_q$-extensions of pointed fusion categories, where $q$ is a prime number. As an application, we classify modular categories of Frobenius-Perron dimension $q^3$.

entry.title: Groebner-Shirshov bases for pre-associative algebras
entry.summary: We develop Groebner---Shirshov bases technique for pre-associative algebras also known as dendriform (di-)algebras.

entry.title: A trick to compute certain Manin products of operads
entry.summary: We describe simple tricks to compute the Manin black products with the operads $\mathcal{A}ss$, $\mathcal{C}om$ and $pre\mathcal{L}ie$.

entry.title: Folding KLR algebras
entry.summary: This paper develops the theory of KLR algebras with a Dynkin diagram automorphism. This is foundational material intended to allow folding techniques in the theory of KLR algebras.

entry.title: Deformation quantization with separation of variables on a super-Kähler manifold
entry.summary: We construct deformation quantizations with separation of variables on a split super-K\"ahler manifold and describe their canonical supertrace densities.

entry.title: An operadic approach to operator-valued free cumulants
entry.summary: An operadic framework is developed to explain the inversion formula relating moments and cumulants in operator-valued free probability theory.

entry.title: Star-product on complex sphere $\mathbb{S}^{2n}$
entry.summary: We construct a $U_q(\mathrm{so}(2n+1))$-equivariant local star-product on the complex sphere $\mathbb{S}^{2n}$ as a Non-Levi conjugacy class $SO(2n+1)/SO(2n)$.

entry.title: A curious differential calculus on the quantum disc and cones
entry.summary: A non-classical differential calculus on the quantum disc and cones is constructed and the associated integral is calculated.

entry.title: Boson-fermion correspondence from factorization spaces
entry.summary: We give a proof of the boson-fermion correspondence (an isomorphism of lattice and fermion vertex algebras) in terms of isomorphism of factorization spaces.

entry.title: On Correlation Functions of Vertex Operator Algebras Associated to Jordan Algebras
entry.summary: In this paper we study certain vertex operator algebras associated to Jordan algebras and compute the correlation function of basic fields

entry.title: The classification of extensions of $L_{sl_3}(k,0)$
entry.summary: IIn this paper, extensions of affine vertex operator algebras $L_{sl_3}(k,0)$, $k\in \mathbb{Z}_+$, are classified by modular invariants.

entry.title: Vertex Algebras According to Isaac Newton
entry.summary: We give an introduction to vertex algebras using elementary forward difference methods originally due to Isaac Newton.

entry.title: On the coefficients of the Alekseev Torossian associator
entry.summary: This paper explains a method to calculate the coefficients of the Alekseev-Torossian associator as linear combinations of iterated integrals of Kontsevich weight forms of Lie graphs.

entry.title: The classification of finite-dimensional triangular Hopf algebras over an algebraically closed field of characteristic 0
entry.summary: We explain that a new theorem of Deligne on symmetric tensor categories implies, in a straightforward manner, that any finite dimensional triangular Hopf algebra over an algebraically closed field of characteristic zero has Chevalley property, and in particular the list of finite dimensional triangular Hopf algebras over such a field given in math.QA/0008232, math.QA/0101049 is complete. We also use Deligne's theorem to settle a number of questions about triangular Hopf algebras, raised in our previous publications, and generalize Deligne's result to nondegenerate semisimple categories in characteristic $p$, by using lifting methods developed in math.QA/0203060.

entry.title: Combinatorial Formulae for Nested Bethe Vectors
entry.summary: We give combinatorial formulae for vector-valued weight functions (off-shell nested Bethe vectors) for tensor products of irreducible evaluation modules over the Yangian $Y({\mathfrak{gl}}_N)$ and the quantum affine algebra $U_q(\widetilde{{\mathfrak{gl}}_N})$. The results of the paper were obtained in 1998 and were used in math.QA/9905137, math.QA/0302148, math.QA/0610517.

entry.title: On Function Theory in Quantum Disc: Covariance
entry.summary: Our previous work (math.QA/9808015) introduces the basic notions and announces some results on function theory in the quantum disc. The present paper establishes a relationship between those results and the quantum groups theory.

entry.title: On Function Theory in Quantum Disc: A q-Analogue of Berezin Transform
entry.summary: This work contains a proof of theorem 7.3 from math.QA/9808015. This theorem demonstrates the Berezin method to be applicable for producing a well known one-parameter deformation of the quantum disc.

entry.title: Formality of Chain Operad of Small Squares
entry.summary: We prove that the chain operad of small squares is formal. This fact clarifies situation with the proof of M. Kontsevich formality theorem in the paper of the author math.QA/9803025, revised Sept 24. The formality of the operad follows quite easily from the existence of an associator.

entry.title: The Correspondence between Geometric Quantization and Formal Deformation Quantization
entry.summary: Using the classification of formal deformation quantizations, and the formal, algebraic index theorem, I give a simple proof as to which formal deformation quantization (modulo isomorphism) is derived from a given geometric quantization.
entry.arxiv:comment: 7 pages. AMS-LaTeX and AMS fonts (including Euler). Corollary to math.QA/9808116

entry.title: Quantum matrix ball: differential and integral calculi
entry.summary: We have introduced q-analogues of bounded symmetric domains in our work q-alg/9703005. Given the simplest ones among those, the works q-alg/9603012 and math.QA/9803110 announce the relations describing the algebras of functions, differential and integral calculi. This paper presents the proofs of these results.

entry.title: A Remark On the FRTS realization and Drinfeld Realization of Quantum Affine Superalgebra $U_q(\hat {osp}(1,2))$
entry.summary: In this paper, we present the hidden symmetry behind the Faddeev-Reshetikhin-Takhtajan-Semenov-Tian-Shansky realization of quantum affine superalgebras $U_q(\hat {osp}(1,2))$ and add the q-Serre relation to the Drinfeld realization of $U_q(\hat {osp}(1,2))$ (math.QA/9712011) derived from the FRTS realization.

entry.title: Noncommutative algebras associated to complexes and graphs
entry.summary: This is a first of our papers devoted to "noncommutative topology and graph theory". Its origin is the paper math.QA/0002238 by I. Gelfand, V. Retakh, and R.L. Wilson where a new class of noncommutative algebras $Q_n$ was introduced. The algebra $Q_n$ is closely related to factorizations of a generic polynomial of degree $n$ over a division algebra into linear factors.

entry.title: Crossingless matchings and the cohomology of (n,n) Springer varieties
entry.summary: The sequence of rings $H^n, n\ge 0,$ introduced in math.QA/0103190, controls categorification of the quantum sl(2) invariant of tangles. We prove that the center of $H^n$ is isomorphic to the cohomology ring of the (n,n) Springer variety and show that the braid group action in the derived category of $H^n$-modules descends to the Springer action of the symmetric group.

entry.title: Classification of holomorphic vector bundles on noncommutative two-tori
entry.summary: We prove that every holomorphic vector bundle on a noncommutative two-torus $T$ can be obtained by successive extensions from standard holomorphic bundles considered in math.QA/0211262. This implies that the category of holomorphic bundles on $T$ is equivalent to the heart of certain $t$-structure on the derived category of coherent sheaves on an elliptic curve.

entry.title: Canonical bases of loop algebras via quot schemes II
entry.summary: This paper is a sequel (and contains a better treatment) of math.QA/0404032; We construct some canonical bases for quantum toroidal algebras of types D_4, E_6, E_7, E_8 using perverse sheaves on quot schemes parametrizing equivariant coherent sheaves on elliptic curves. We also study some compatibility properties of these bases with some natural filtrations and modules.

entry.title: On a class of Koszul algebras associated to directed graphs
entry.summary: In math.QA/0506507 I. Gelfand and the authors introduced and studied a new class of algebras associated to directed graphs. In this paper we show that these algebras are Koszul for a large class of layered (i.e. ranked) graphs.

entry.title: Formal Homotopy Quantum Field Theories, II : Simplicial Formal Maps
entry.summary: Simplicial formal maps were introduced in the first paper, (math.QA/0512032), of this series as a tool for studying Homotopy Quantum Field Theories with background a general homotopy 2-type. Here we continue their study, showing how a natural generalisation can handle much more general backgrounds. The question of the geometric interpretation of these formal maps is partially answered in terms of combinatorial bundles. This suggests new interpretations of HQFTs.
entry.arxiv:comment: 21 pages, Contribution to the Streetfest proceedings

entry.title: A Quantum Canonical Embedding
entry.summary: This paper presents an English version of a chapter of the L.L. Vaksman book `Quantum Bounded Symmetric Domains', see arXiv:0803.3769 [math.QA]. This chapter deals with a quantum analog of a canonical embedding of a bounded symmetric domain.

entry.title: BiHom-pre-Lie algebras, BiHom-Leibniz algebras and Rota-Baxter operators on BiHom-Lie algebras
entry.summary: We investigate some properties of Rota-Baxter operators on BiHom-Lie algebras. Along the way, we introduce BiHom analogues of pre-Lie and Leibniz algebras.
entry.arxiv:comment: 15 pages. The content of this paper was part of the first version of arXiv:math.QA/1703.07275

entry.title: Some details of proofs of theorems related to the quantum dynamical Yang-Baxter equation
entry.summary: This paper gives some further details of proofs of some theorems related to the quantum dynamical Yang-Baxter equation. This mainly expands proofs given in "Lectures on the dynamical Yang-Baxter equation" by P. Etingof and O. Schiffmann, math.QA/9908064. This concerns the intertwining operator, the fusion matrix, the exchange matrix and the difference operators. The last part expands proofs given in "Traces of intertwiners for quantum groups and difference equations, I" by P. Etingof and A. Varchenko, math.QA/9907181. This concerns the dual Macdonald-Ruijsenaars equations. This paper does not claim originality, priority or completeness. It is meant as a service to whoever may take profit of it.

entry.title: A Formality Theorem for Hochschild Chains
entry.summary: We prove Tsygan's formality conjecture for Hochschild chains of the algebra of functions on an arbitrary smooth manifold M using the Fedosov resolutions proposed in math.QA/0307212 and the formality quasi-isomorphism for Hochschild chains of R[[y_1, ..., y_d]] proposed in paper math.QA/0010321 by Shoikhet. This result allows us to describe traces on the quantum algebra of functions on an arbitrary Poisson manifold.
entry.arxiv:comment: 41 pages, 5 figures. To appear in Adv. Math

entry.title: An analog of a modular functor from quantized Teichmüller theory, I
entry.summary: This paper has been withdrawn by the author(s). The material contained in the paper will be published in a subtantially reorganized form, part of it is now included in math.QA/0510174
entry.arxiv:comment: withdrawn, large portion of the material now appears in math.QA/0510174, rest will appear elsewhere in reorganized form

entry.title: New deformations of group algebras of Coxeter groups
entry.summary: We define new deformations of group algebras of Coxeter groups W and of subgroups of even elements in them, by deforming the braid relations. We show that these deformations are algebraically flat iff they are formally flat, and that this happens iff the group W has no finite parabolic subgroups of rank 3. The proof uses the theory of constructible sheaves on cell complexes attached to W. We explain the connection of our deformations with the Hecke algebras of orbifolds defined by the first author in math.QA/0406499 and with generalized double affine Hecke algebras defined by the authors and A. Oblomkov in math.QA/0406480. The paper is dedicated to the memory of Walter Feit.

entry.title: A PBW theorem for O_e(M_n), O_e(GL_n) and O_e(SL_n) over O(M_n), O(GL_n) and O(SL_n)
entry.summary: This paper has been withdrawn by the author. Its natural evolution is preprint math.QA/0610691, which is different enough to bear a different title (though they share about 2/3s of common content).
entry.arxiv:comment: This paper has been withdrawn by the author. Its natural evolution is preprint math.QA/0610691, which is different enough to bear a different title

entry.title: Quantum symmetric spaces and related q-orthogonal polynomials
entry.summary: A class of quantum analogues of compact symmetric spaces of classical type is introduced by means of constant solutions to the reflection equations. Their zonal spherical functions are discussed in connection with $q$-orthogonal polynomials.

entry.title: On Gauss decomposition of quantum groups and Jimbo homomorphism
entry.summary: It is shown that the properties of the Gauss decomposition of quantum groups and the known Jimbo homomorphism permit us to realize these groups as subalgebras of well defined algebras constructed from generators of the corresponding undeformed Lie algebras.

entry.title: Lifting formulas II
entry.summary: In the present paper we generalize the lifting formulas from [Sh] and obtain the formula for the (2n+2l-1)-cocycle on the LIe algebra of differential operators on a n-dimensional space for arbitrary n and l.

entry.title: t-deformation of quantum Schubert polynomials
entry.summary: We construct a certain solution to the Witten--Dijkgraf--Verlinde--Verlinde equation related to the small quantum cohomology ring of flag variety, and study the t-deformation of quantum Schubert polynomials corresponding to this solution.

entry.title: The projective class ring of half-quantum groups at roots of unity
entry.summary: We describe the structure of the Grothendieck ring of projective modules of basic Hopf algebras using a positive integer determined by the composition series of the principal indecomposable projective module.

entry.title: Level One Representations of Quantum Affine Algebras $U_q(C^{(1)}_n)$
entry.summary: We give explicit constructions of quantum symplectic affine algebras at level 1 using vertex operators.

entry.title: Vassiliev theory and regional change
entry.summary: The purpose of this note is to state some definitions that may be useful in the study of knots, manifolds and the like. They apply to anything for which the concept of a regional change can be defined, such as a product of elements in a group.

entry.title: Affine quantum groups and equivariant K-theory
entry.summary: We give complete proofs of the K-theoretic construction of the quantized enveloping algebra of affine gl(n) sketched with V. Ginzburg in Internat. Math. Res. Notices, 3 (1993).

entry.title: Another proof of M. Kontsevich formality theorem
entry.summary: The paper contains an alternative proof of M. Kontsevich Formality Theorem.

entry.title: Raising operators of row type for Macdonald polynomials
entry.summary: Raising operators of row type are constructed by means of an interpolation method. These are a dual version of the raising operators of column type by A.N.Kirillov and M.Noumi. An extension of the q-binomial coefficients is introduced in relation to the raising operators.

entry.title: Affine Weyl groups, discrete dynamical systems and Painleve equations
entry.summary: A new class of representations of affine Weyl groups on rational functions are constructed, in order to formulate discrete dynamical systems associated with affine root systems. As an application, some examples of difference and differential systems of Painleve type are discussed.

entry.title: A classification of inner actions of the Dipper-Donkin quantization GL_2 on the Clifford algebra C(1,3)
entry.summary: We present all inner actions on the Clifford algebra C(1,3) of the quantum group GL_2 constructed by Dipper and Donkin.

entry.title: A family of combinatorial identities arising form quantum affine algebras
entry.summary: We obtain a family of new combinatorial identities for symmetric formal power series.

entry.title: Classification of irreducible modules for the vertex operator algebra M(1)^+
entry.summary: We classify the irreducible modules for the fixed point vertex operator subebra of the rank 1 free bosonic VOA under the -1 automorphism.
entry.arxiv:comment: Latex 2e, 24 pages, several mistakes are corrected

entry.title: From Double Hecke algebra to analysis
entry.summary: We discuss q-counterparts of the Gauss integrals, a new type of Gauss-Selberg sums at roots of unity, and q-deformations of Riemann's zeta. The paper contains general results, one-dimensional formulas, and remarks about the current projects involving the double affine Hecke algebras.

entry.title: Representations of vertex operator algebra V_L^+ for rank one lattice L
entry.summary: We classify the irreducible modules for the fixed point vertex operator subalgebra V_L^+ of the vertex operator algebra V_L associated to a positive definite even lattice of rank 1 under the automorphism lifted from the -1 isometry of L.

entry.title: Determinant formulas for the $τ$-functions of the Painlevé equations of type $A$
entry.summary: Explicit determinant formulas are presented for the $\tau$ functions of the generalized Painlev\'e equations of type $A$. This result allows an interpretation of the $\tau$-functions as the Pl\"ucker coordinates of the universal Grassmann manifold.

entry.title: Higher order Painlevé equations of type $A^{(1)}_l$
entry.summary: A series of systems of nonlinear equations with affine Weyl group symmetry of type $A^{(1)}_l$ is studied. This series gives a generalization of Painlev\'e equations $P_{IV}$ and $P_{V}$ to higher orders.

entry.title: Planscherel Measure on E_q(2)
entry.summary: Following the construction of the invariant integral and the scalar product for the quantum Euclidean group E_q(2), we obtained the full matrix elements of its unitary irreducible representations from SU_q(2) by contraction and then derived the Planscherel measure.

entry.title: The Work of R.E. Borcherds
entry.summary: Laudation delivered at the International Congress of Mathematicians in Berlin following the award of the Fields Medal to Richard Borcherds.
entry.arxiv:comment: 9 pages, LaTeX, to appear in the Proceedings of the International Congress of Mathematicians 1998

entry.title: Fedosov Star-Products and 1-Differentiable Deformations
entry.summary: We show that every star product on a symplectic manifold defines uniquely a 1-differentiable deformation of the Poisson bracket. Explicit formulas are given. As a corollary we can identify the characteristic class of any star product as a part of its explicit (Fedosov) expression.

entry.title: On correlation functions of Drinfeld currents and shuffle algebras
entry.summary: We express the vanishing conditions satisfied by the correlation functions of Drinfeld currents of quantum affine algebras, imposed by the quantum Serre relations. We discuss the relation of these vanishing conditions with a shuffle algebra description of the algebra of Drinfeld currents.

entry.title: On highest weight modules over elliptic quantum groups
entry.summary: The purpose of this note is to define and construct highest weight modules for Felder's elliptic quantum groups. This is done by using exchange matrices for intertwining operators between (not necessarily finite-dimensional) modules over quantum affine algebras.

entry.title: Center and Universal R-matrix for Quantized Borcherds Superalgebras
entry.summary: We construct a nondegenerate symmetric bilinear form on quantized enveloping algebras associated to Borcherds superalgebras. With this, we study its center and its universal R-matrix.
entry.arxiv:comment: 25 pages, figures drawn with the "texdraw" package

entry.title: On twisting solutions to the Yang-Baxter equation
entry.summary: Sufficient conditions for an invertible two-tensor $F$ to relate two solutions to the Yang-Baxter equation via the transformation $R\to F^{-1}_{21} R F$ are formulated. Those conditions include relations arising from twisting of certain quasitriangular bialgebras.

entry.title: Deformed Galilei symmetry
entry.summary: A particular deformation of central extended Galilei group is considered. It is shown that the deformation influences the rules of constructing the composed systems while one particle states remain basically unaffected. In particular the mass appeared to be non additive.

entry.title: Green function on the quantum plane
entry.summary: Green function (which can be called the q-analogous of the Hankel function) on the quantum plane E_q^2= E_q(2)/U(1) is constructed.

entry.title: Meromorphic braided category arising in quantum affine algebras
entry.summary: We construct a category of flat vector bundles on an elliptic curve. It arises in the representation theory of quantum affine algebras and carries meromorphic braided structure with singularities on the diagonal of the square of the curve.

entry.title: On the Quantum Lorentz Group
entry.summary: The quantum analogues of Pauli matrices are introduced and investigated. From these matrices and an appropriate trace over spinorial indiceswe construct a quantum Minkowsky metric. In this framework, we show explicitely the correspondance between the SL(2,C) and Lorentz quantum groups.

entry.title: On the Comultiplication in Quantum Affine Algebras
entry.summary: We express the comultiplication of the generators in Drinfelds second realization of the quantum affine algebra U_q(sl_2^), induced by the comultiplication of the generators in the Drinfeld-Jimbo realization of U_q(sl_2^) in terms of generating functions. Then we find explicit expressions for the comultiplication of the generators.

entry.title: Coalgebra-Galois extensions from the extension theory point of view
entry.summary: Coalgebra-Galois extensions generalise Hopf-Galois extensions, which can be viewed as non-commutative torsors. In this paper it is analysed when a coalgebra-Galois extension is a separable, split, or strongly separable extension.

entry.title: Quantum automorphism groups of finite graphs
entry.summary: We determine the quantum automorphism groups of finite graphs. These are quantum subgroups of the quantum permutation groups defined by Wang. The quantum automorphism group is a stronger invariant for finite graphs than the usual one. We get a quantum dihedral group D4.

entry.title: A new aspect of representations of U_q(\hat{sl_2})--generic case
entry.summary: An polynomial identity is derived from the representation V_m(x)\otimes V_n(y) of U_q(\hat {sl_2}) and a new basis of V_m(x)\otimes V_n(y) is established under some condition.

entry.title: Transformation Laws for Theta functions
entry.summary: We prove some results which extend the classical theory, due to Hecke-Schoeneberg, of the transformation laws of theta functions. Although our results are classical in natural, they were suggested by recent work involving modular-invariance in conformal field theory.

entry.title: Z_n Quasialgebras
entry.summary: Recently we have reformulated the octonions as quasissociative algebras (quasialgebras) living in a symmetric monoidal category. In this note we provide further examples of quasialgebras, namely ones where the nonassociativity is induced by a Z_n-grading and a nontrivial 3-cocycle

entry.title: Canonical Bases for Hecke Algebra Quotients
entry.summary: We establish the existence of an IC basis for the generalized Temperley--Lieb algebra associated to a Coxeter system of arbitrary type. We determine this basis explicitly in the case where the Coxeter system is simply laced and the algebra is finite dimensional.

entry.title: The radical of a vertex operator algebra associated to a module
entry.summary: The radical of a vertex operator algebra associated to a module is defined and computed.
entry.arxiv:comment: Latex 14 pages. This is part of the original paper with a new title

entry.title: Galois reconstruction of finite quantum groups
entry.summary: We describe a universal factorization for a functor with values in finite-dimensional measured algebras. More precisely we contruct the quantum automorphism group of this functor. This general recontruction result allows us to recapture a finite-dimensional Hopf algebra from the category of finite-dimensional measured comodule algebras.

entry.title: Theorie de Toda sur reseau et espaces homogenes quantiques
entry.summary: Cet article expose un isomorphisme entre l'espace des phases du systeme de sinus-Gordon quantique sur reseaux et un espace homogene quantique pour $U_q(\hat{sl_2})$.

entry.title: Q-differential operators
entry.summary: We set up a framework for discussing `$q$-analogues' of the usual covariant differential operators for hermitian symmetric spaces. This turns out to be directly related to the deformation quantization associated to quadratic algebras satisfying certain conditions introduced by Procesi and De Concini.

entry.title: Remarks on quantization of classical r-matrices
entry.summary: If a classical $r$-matrix $r$ is skewsymmetric, its quantization $R$ can lose the skewsymmetry property. Even when $R$ is skewsymmetric, it may not be unique.

entry.title: A projection property for Kazhdan-Lusztig bases
entry.summary: We compare the canonical basis for a generalized Temperley-Lieb algebra of type A or B with the Kazhdan-Lusztig basis for the corresponding Hecke algebra.

entry.title: A categorification of the Jones polynomial
entry.summary: We construct a bigraded cohomology theory of links whose Euler characteristic is the Jones polynomial.
entry.arxiv:comment: latex, 51 pages, 72 eps figures, to appear in Duke Mathematical Journal

entry.title: Planar algebras, I
entry.summary: We introduce a notion of planar algebra, the simplest example of which is a vector space of tensors, closed under planar contractions. A planar algebra with suitable positivity properties produces a finite index subfactor of a II_1 factor, and vice versa.

entry.title: Rationality of unitary N=2 vertex operator superalgebras
entry.summary: In this note we prove that the vertex operator superalgebras associated to the unitary representations of the N=2 superconformal algebra are rational.

entry.title: Toda and KdV
entry.summary: The main object of this paper is to produce a deformation of the KdV hierarchy of partial differential equations. We construct this deformation by taking a certain limit of the Toda hierarchy. This construction also provides a deformation of the Virasoro algebra.

entry.title: Irreducibility of some quantum representations of mapping class groups
entry.summary: The SU(2) TQFT representation of the mapping class group of a closed surface of genus g, at a root of unity of prime order, is shown to be irreducible. Some examples of reducible representations are also given.

entry.title: Equivalence of conformal superalgebras to Hamiltonian superoperators
entry.summary: In this paper, we present a formal variational calculus of super functions in one real variable and find the conditions for a "matrix differential operator" to be a Hamiltonian superoperator. Moreover, we prove that conformal superalgebras are equivalent to certain Hamiltonian superoperators.
entry.arxiv:comment: Latex,32pages; To appear in Algebra Colloquium

entry.title: Generalizations of the Block algebras
entry.summary: In this paper, we introduce two new families of infinite-dimensional simple Lie algebras and a new family of infinite-dimensional simple Lie superalgebras. These algebras can be viewed as generalizations of the Block algebras.
entry.arxiv:comment: 31pages, Latex; To appear in Manuscripta Mathematica

entry.title: Modular Double of Quantum Group
entry.summary: An extension of Quantum Group is described. We propose to unite the quantum groups with parameter q and with parameter modularly dual to q.

entry.title: Quiver varieties and finite dimensional representations of quantum affine algebras
entry.summary: We study finite dimensional representations of the quantum affine algebra, using geometry of quiver varieties introduced by the author. As an application, we obtain character formulas expressed in terms of intersection cohomologies of quiver varieties.

entry.title: A Duality Theorem for Quantum Groupoids
entry.summary: We prove a duality theorem for quantum groupoid (weak Hopf algebra) actions that extends the well-known result for usual Hopf algebras.

entry.title: Classification of infinite-dimensional simple groups of supersymmetries and quantum field theory
entry.summary: Talk given at the conference "Visions in Mathematics toward the year 2000", August 1999, Tel-Aviv.
entry.arxiv:comment: 25 pages; a few corrections made in the new version

entry.title: Summation and transformation formulas for elliptic hypergeometric series
entry.summary: Using matrix inversion and determinant evaluation techniques we prove several summation and transformation formulas for terminating, balanced, very-well-poised, elliptic hypergeometric series.

entry.title: Trace Functionals of the Kontsevich Quantization
entry.summary: We generalize the notion of trace to the Kontsevich quantization algebra and show that for all Poisson manifolds representable by quotients of a symplectic manifold by a Hamiltonian action of a nilpotent Lie group, the trace is given by integration with respect to a unimodular volume form.

entry.title: Twisting the fake monster superalgebra
entry.summary: We calculate twisted denominator identities of the fake monster superalgebra and use them to construct new examples of supersymmetric generalized Kac-Moody superalgebras. Their denominator identities give new infinite product identities.

entry.title: Polytopes for Crystallized Demazure Modules and Exremal Vectors
entry.summary: We give a parametrization for crystal bases of Demazure modules as a set of lattice points in some convex polytope and we also describe explicitly the extremal vectors as solutions of some system of linear equations.

entry.title: Quasi-Hopf algebras associated with semisimple Lie algebras and complex curves
entry.summary: We construct quasi-Hopf algebras associated with a semisimple Lie algebra, a complex curve and a rational differential. This generalizes our previous joint work with V. Rubtsov (Israel J. Math. (1999) and q-alg/9608005).

entry.title: Symmetrizer and Antisymmetrizer of the Birman-Wenzl-Murakami Algebras
entry.summary: Explicit formulas for the symmetrizer and the antisymmetrizer of the Birman-Wenzl-Murakami algebras BWM(r,q)_n are given.
entry.arxiv:comment: 6 pages. To appear in Lett. Math. Phys

entry.title: Tamarkin's proof of Kontsevich formality theorem
entry.summary: In 1998 D. Tamarkin announced a proof of Kontsevich formality theorem based on the existence of structure of homotopy Gerstenhaber algebra in the Hochschild cochains of an associative algebra. In this note we give a detailed explanation of Tamarkin's result.

entry.title: Hankel transform via double Hecke algebra
entry.summary: We use a degeneration of the 1D double affine Hecke algebra and the Dunkl operator to study systematically nonsymmetric Bessel functions and their truncations.

entry.title: Differential calculi on finite groups
entry.summary: A brief review of bicovariant differential calculi on finite groups is given, with some new developments on diffeomorphisms and integration. We illustrate the general theory with the example of the nonabelian finite group S_3.
entry.arxiv:journal_ref: JHEP, Proceedings of the Corfu Summer Inst. on Elementary Particle Phys.,1999

entry.title: On a Vanishing Theorem of Kontsevich
entry.summary: This paper has been withdrawn by the authors, due a crucial mistake in Lemma 2

entry.title: An example concerning Ohtsuki's invariant and the full SO(3) quautum invariant
entry.summary: Two lens spaces are given to show that Ohtsuki's $\tau$ for rational homology spheres does not determine Kirby-Melvin's $\{\tau_r^{'}, r odd\geq3\}$
entry.arxiv:comment: Latex. To appear in Letters in Math. Physics

entry.title: Finite Quantum Groupoids and Their Applications
entry.summary: We give a survey of the theory of finite quantum groupoids (weak Hopf algebras), including foundations of the theory and applications to finite depth subfactors, dynamical deformations of quantum groups, and invariants of knots and 3-manifolds.

entry.title: Invariants of Knots and 3-manifolds from Quantum Groupoids
entry.summary: We use categories of representations of finite dimensional quantum groupoids (weak Hopf algebras) to construct ribbon and modular categories that give rise to invariants of knots and 3-manifolds.

entry.title: Quantum b-functions of prehomogeneous vector spaces of commutative parabolic type
entry.summary: We show that there exists a natural q-analogue of the b-function for the prehomogeneous vector space of commutative parabolic type, and calculate them explicitly in each case. Our method of calculating the b-functions seems to be new even for the original case q=1.

entry.title: Vertex Algebras and Algebraic Curves
entry.summary: This is the text of the Bourbaki seminar that I gave on June 24, 2000.

entry.title: Vanishing of the Kontsevich integrals of the wheels
entry.summary: We prove that the Kontsevich integrals (in the sense of the formality theorem) of all even wheels are equal to zero. We deduce this theorem from the result of \cite{FSh} on the deformation quantization with traces.

entry.title: O_e(G) is a free module over O(G)
entry.summary: We show that the quantised function algebra O_e(G) of a simply-connected semisimple algebraic group G at a root of unity is a free module over the subring isomorphic to O(G).

entry.title: Quasi-Commuting Families of Quantum Minors
entry.summary: We produce neccessary and sufficient conditions for pairs of quantum minors in the quantized coordinate algebra $\Bbb{C}_q[Mat_{k \times m}]$ to quasi-commute. In addition we study the combinatorics of maximal (by inclusion) families of pairwise quasi-commuting quantum minors.

entry.title: Discrete series of representations for Uq(sl(2,R))
entry.summary: A possible generalization of the method of orbits to SLq(2,R) is discussed.
entry.arxiv:journal_ref: In Proc. Quantum Theory and Symmetries (Eds. H.-D. Doebner at al.), World Scientific, Singapore, 2000, p. 470

entry.title: Gel'fand-Dorfman Bialgebras
entry.summary: This is a survey talk on the study of Gel'fand-Dorfman bialgebras.
entry.arxiv:comment: 14 pages, Latex file. A talk given in the workshop on Algebra and Discrete Mathematics at The Chinese University of Hong Kong, 27-31 March 2000

entry.title: On the volume conjecture for hyperbolic knots
entry.summary: In this article, we give a rough, and so not complete yet, proof of Kashaev's conjecture, that is, the volume conjecture for hyperbolic knots, where the hyperbolicity equations associated to knot diagrams appear as the stationary phase equations for Kashaev's invariants.

entry.title: Deformation complex of a d-algebra is a (d+1)-algebra
entry.summary: We prove thst the deformation complex of a d-algebra (shifted by 1-d) carries a natural structure of (d+1)-algebra. This is a purely algebraic version of a similkar theorem of Kontsevich.

entry.title: The Based Ring of Two-Sided Cells of Affine Weyl Groups of Type $\tilde A_{n-1}$
entry.summary: In this paper we prove Lusztig's conjecture on based ring for an affine Weyl group of type $\tilde A_{n-1}$.

entry.title: Intertwining operators and modular invariance
entry.summary: We extend the modular invariance property of the trace functions of vertex operator algebra on the set of irreducible modules (Zhu's theory) to the case of trace functions of intertwining operators.

entry.title: Braided Near-group Categories
entry.summary: A near-group category is an additively semisimple category with a product such that all but one of the simple objects is invertible. We classify braided structures on near-group categories, and give explicit numerical formulas for their associativity and commutativity morphisms.

entry.title: Central Simple Poisson Algebras
entry.summary: In this paper, we determine the isomorphism classes of the central simple Poisson algebras introduced earlier by the second author. The Lie algebra structures of these Poisson algebras are in general not finitely-graded.

entry.title: Classification of infinite dimensional weight modules over the Lie superalgebra $sl(2/1)$
entry.summary: We give a classification of infinite dimensional indecomposable weight modules over the Lie superalgebra $sl(2/1)$.
entry.arxiv:comment: 7 pages, Latex, to appear in Comm. Alg

entry.title: Some remarks on Uq(sl(2,R)) at root of unity
entry.summary: We discuss a modification of Uq(sl(2,R)) and a class of its irreducible representations when q is a root of unity.

entry.title: Hopf group-coalgebras
entry.summary: We study algebraic properties of Hopf group-coalgebras, recently introduced by Turaev. We show the existence of integrals and traces for such coalgebras, and we generalize the main properties of quasitriangular and ribbon Hopf algebras to the setting of Hopf group-coalgebras.

entry.title: The q-characters at roots of unity
entry.summary: We consider various specializations of the non-twisted quantum affine algebras at roots of unity. We define and study the q-characters of their finite-dimensional representations.

entry.title: Special functions, conformal blocks, Bethe ansatz, and SL(3,Z)
entry.summary: This is the talk of the second author at the meeting "Topological Methods in Physical Sciences", London, November 2000. We review our work on KZB equations.

entry.title: Fully commutative Kazhdan-Lusztig cells
entry.summary: We investigate the compatibility of the set of fully commutative elements of a Coxeter group with the various types of Kazhdan-Lusztig cells using a canonical basis for a generalized version of the Temperley-Lieb algebra.

entry.title: Vertex Lie algebras, vertex Poisson algebras and vertex algebras
entry.summary: The notions of vertex Lie algebra and vertex Poisson algebra are presented and connections among vertex Lie algebras, vertex Poisson algebras and vertex algebras are discussed.

entry.title: Operades differentielles graduees sur les simplexes et les permutoedres
entry.summary: We define several differential graded operads, some of them being related to families of polytopes : simplices and permutohedra. We also obtain a presentation by generators and relations of the operad K on associahedra introduced in a previous article.

entry.title: Bethe's states for generalized XXX and XXZ models
entry.summary: For any rational number $p_0\ge 1$ we prove an identity of Rogers-Ramanujan-Gordon-Andrews' type. Bijection between the space of states for XXZ model and that of XXX model is constructed.

entry.title: Jordanian quantum spheres
entry.summary: We introduce and investigate a one parameter family of quantum spaces invariant under the left (right) coactions of the group-like element ${\cal T}_{h}^{(j=1)}$ of the Jordanian function algebra $Fun_{h}(SL(2))$. These spaces may be regarded as Jordanian quantization of the two-dimensional spheres.

entry.title: Elliptic Selberg integrals
entry.summary: We present an elliptic version of Selberg's integral formula.
entry.arxiv:comment: 3 pages, corrected sign error in Theorem 1

entry.title: Sur la conjecture combinatoire de Kashiwara-Vergne
entry.summary: We explain a connection between the combinatorial Kashiwara-Vergne conjecture and the Kontsevich formula for quantization of Poisson manifolds

entry.title: Discretization, Moyal, and integrability
entry.summary: Connections of KP, qKP, and Moyal type dKP constructions are developed. Some expansion of the Moyal KP procedures of Kemmoku-Saito is given with clarification of the role of spectral variables as a phase space.

entry.title: On quantum shuffle and quantum affine algebras
entry.summary: A construction of the quantum affine algebra $U_q(g)$ is given in two steps. We explain how to obtain the algebra from its positive Borel subalgebra $U_q(b^+)$, using a construction similar to Drinfeld's quantum double. Then we show how the positive Borel subalgebra can be constructed with quantum shuffles.

entry.title: Quantum G-manifolds
entry.summary: Let $G$ be a Lie group, $\g$ its Lie algebra, and $U_h(\g)$ the corresponding quantum group. We consider some examples of $U_h(\g)$-invariant one and two parameter quantizations on $G$-manifolds.
entry.arxiv:comment: Latex2e, 13 pp. A talk at the workshop "New homological and categorical methods in mathematical physics", Manchester, July 5-12, 2001

entry.title: A remark on Fourier pairing and binomial formula for Macdonald polynomials
entry.summary: We give a concise direct proof of the orthogonality of interpolation Macdonald polynomials with respect to the Fourier pairing and briefly discuss some immediate applications of this orthogonality, such as the symmetry of the Fourier pairing and the binomial formula.

entry.title: Involutions of double affine Hecke algebras
entry.summary: The main aim of the paper is to formulate and prove a result about the structure of double affine Hecke algebras which allows its two commutative subalgebras to play a symmetric role. This result is essential for the theory of intertwiners of double affine Hecke algebras.

entry.title: Crystal bases and quiver varieties (Geometric construction of crystal bases II)
entry.summary: We give a crystal structure on the set of all irreducible components of Lagrangian subvarieties of quiver varieties. One con show that, as a crystal, it is isomorphic to the crystal base of an irreducible highest weight representation of a quantized universal enveloping algebra.

entry.title: Exchange relations of Level-two vertex operators of $U_q(\hat{sl_2})$
entry.summary: We calculate the exchange relations of vertex operators of $U_q(\hat{sl_2})$ at level-two from its bosonic realization. The corresponding invertibility relation of type I vertex operators is also studied.

entry.title: A spanning set for VOA modules
entry.summary: We develop a spanning set for weak modules of C_2 co-finite vertex operator algebras. This spanning set has finiteness properties that we use to show weak modules are C_n co-finite and A_n(M) is finite dimensional.

entry.title: Differential geometry of the Z_3-graded quantum superplane
entry.summary: In this work, differential geometry of the Z$_3$-graded quantum superplane is constructed. The corresponding quantum Lie superalgebra and its Hopf algebra structure are obtained.

entry.title: Hopf algebra structure of Gr$_q(1| 1)$ related to GL$_q(1| 1)$
entry.summary: We show that the algebra of functions on the Grassmann supergroup Gr$_q(1| 1)$ has a (graded) Hopf algebra structure related to GL$_q(1| 1)$.

entry.title: h-deformation of Grassmann supergroup Gr$(1| 1)$
entry.summary: We introduce the h-deformation of the algebra of functions on the grassmann supergroup Gr$(1|1)$ via a contraction of Gr$_q(1|1)$.

entry.title: Differential geometry of GL$_h(1| 1)$
entry.summary: We construct a right-invariant differential calculus on the quantum supergroup GL$_h(1| 1)$ and obtain the $h$-deformed superalgebra of GL$_h(1| 1)$.

entry.title: Two-Parameter Differential Calculus on the h-Exterior Plane
entry.summary: We construct a two-parameter covariant differential calculus on the quantum $h$-exterior plane. We also give a deformation of the two-dimensional fermionic phase space.

entry.title: Quantum properties of the dual matrices in $GL_q(1|1)$
entry.summary: In this paper, we give the quantum analogue of the dual matrices for the quantum supergroup $GL_q(1|1)$ and discuss these properties of the quantum dual supermatrices.

entry.title: Koszul duality for dioperads
entry.summary: We introduce the notion of a dioperad to describe certain operations with multiple inputs and multiple outputs. The framework of Koszul duality for operads is generalized to dioperads. We show that the Lie bialgebra dioperad is Koszul.

entry.title: Patterns in knot cohomology I
entry.summary: Cohomology theory of links, introduced by the author, is combinatorial. Dror Bar-Natan recently wrote a program that found ranks of cohomology groups of all prime knots with up to 11 crossings. His surprising experimental data is discussed in this note.

entry.title: Operadic deformations as a tool for cogravity
entry.summary: The deformation equation and its integrability condition (Bianchi identity) of a non-(co)associative deformation in operad algebra are found. Based on physical analogies, cogravity equations are proposed.

entry.title: Module categories over the Drinfeld double of a finite group
entry.summary: We classify the module categories over the double (possibly twisted) of a finite group.
entry.arxiv:comment: 10 pages, mistake in Section 4 from published version is fixed

entry.title: From Double Lie Groups to Quantum Groups
entry.summary: It is shown that there is a $C^*$-algebraic quantum group related to any double Lie group. An algebra underlying this quantum group is an algebra of a differential groupoid naturally associated with a double Lie group

entry.title: Rationality, Regularity, and C_2-cofiniteness
entry.summary: We demonstrate that, for CFT vertex operator algebras, C_2-cofiniteness and rationality is equivalent to regularity. In addition, we show that, for C_2-cofinite vertex operators algebras, irreducible weak modules are ordinary modules and C_2-cofinite, and V_L^+ are C_2-cofinite.

entry.title: t-analogs of q-characters of quantum affine algebras of type $A_n$, $D_n$
entry.summary: We give a tableaux sum expression of $t$--analog of $q$--characters of finite dimensional representations (standard modules) of quantum affine algebras $\Ul$ when $\g$ is of type $A_n$, $D_n$.

entry.title: Podleś' Quantum Sphere: Dual Coalgebra and Classification of Covariant First Order Differential Calculus
entry.summary: The dual coalgebra of Podle\'s' quantum sphere O_q(S^2_c) is determined explicitly. This result is used to classify all finite dimensional covariant first order differential calculi over O_q(S^2_c) for all but exceptional values of the parameter c.

entry.title: Characters of $\U_q\bigl(gl(n)\bigr)$-reflection equation algebra
entry.summary: We list characters (one-dimensional representations) of the reflection equation algebra associated with the fundamental vector representation of the Drinfeld-Jimbo quantum group $\U_q\bigl(gl(n)\bigr)$.

entry.title: Categorification of some level two representations of sl(n)
entry.summary: We categorify representations of quantum sl(n) whose highest weight is twice a fundamental weight.
