entry.arxiv:journal_ref: J. of Knot Theory and Its Ramifications, Vol. 15, No. 6 (2006) 695-713.

entry.title: On coefficients of Yablonskii-Vorob'ev polynomial
entry.summary: We give a formula for the coefficients of the Yablonskii-Vorob'ev polynomial. Also the reduction modulo a prime number of the polynomial is studied.

entry.title: Classification of polarized deformation quantizations
entry.summary: We give a classification of polarized deformation quantizations on a symplectic manifold with a (complex) polarization. Also, we establish a formula which relates the characteristic class of a polarized deformation quantization to its Fedosov class and the Chern class of the polarization.

entry.title: Hopf Galois extensions, triangular structures, and Frobenius Lie algebras in prime characteristic
entry.summary: We investigate the transformed Hopf algebras in Hopf Galois extensions. The final goal of this paper is to introduce certain triangular Hopf algebras associated with restricted Frobenius Lie algebras over a field of characteristic $p>0$.

entry.title: A PBW commutator lemma for U_q[gl(m|n)]
entry.summary: We present and prove in detail a Poincare--Birkhoff--Witt commutator lemma for the quantum superalgebra U_q[gl(m|n)].

entry.title: Cells in quantum affine sl_n
entry.summary: We study Lusztig's theory of cells for quantum affine $\mathfrak{sl}_n$. Using the geometric construction of the quantum group due to Lusztig and Ginzburg--Vasserot, we describe explicitly the two-sided cells, the number of left cells in a two--sided cell, and the asymptotic algebra, verifying conjectures of Lusztig.

entry.title: Convergent star product algebras on "ax+b"
entry.summary: We define non-tempered (exponential growth) function spaces on the Lie group ax+b which are stable under some left-invariant (convergent) star product.

entry.title: Finite growth representations of infinite Lie conformal algebras
entry.summary: We classify all finite growth representations of all infinite rank subalgebras of the Lie conformal algebra gc_1 that contain a Virasoro subalgebra.

entry.title: On representations of braid groups determined by directed graphs
entry.summary: We show that the two coproducts of a Markov $L$-coalgebra yield at least two solutions of the Yang-Baxter equation and thus at least two representations of braid groups.

entry.title: Classification of irreducible modules for the vertex operator algebra V_L^+: General case
entry.summary: The irreducible modules for the fixed point vertex operator subalgebra V_L^+ of the vertex operator algebra V_L associated to an arbitrary positive definite even lattice L under the automorphism lifted from the -1 isometry of L are classified.

entry.title: Geometrical construction of quantum groups representations
entry.summary: We describe geometrically the classical and quantum inhomogeneous groups $G_0=(SL(2, \BbbC)\triangleright \BbbC^2)$ and $G_1=(SL(2, \BbbC)\triangleright \BbbC^2)\triangleright \BbbC$ by studying explicitly their shape algebras as a spaces of polynomial functions with a quadratic relations.

entry.title: A cocycle for the comultiplication on the quantum SU(2) group
entry.summary: For the family Delta_q, q in [0,1), of the SU_q(2)-comultiplications on the C*-algebra A\cong C(SU_q(2)), we show that there exist unitary operators Omega_q such that Delta_q(x)=Omega_q Delta_0(x) (Omega_q)* for x in A.

entry.title: A characterization of Morita equivalence pairs of quantales
entry.summary: We characterize the pairs of sup-lattices which occur as pairs of Morita equivalence bimodules between quantales in terms of the mutual relation between the sup-lattices.

entry.title: Remarks on quantum differential operators
entry.summary: Various aspects of q-differential equations are examined in the contexts of quantum groups and spaces, differential calculi, zero curvature, and Lax-Sato hierarchies. There are many explicit formulas and examples along with some survey material.

entry.title: An algorithm for computing the global basis of a finite dimensional irreducible $U_{q}(so_{2n+1})$ or $U_{q}(so_{2n})$-module
entry.summary: We describe a simple algorithm for computing the canonical basis of any irreducible finite-dimensional $U_{q}(so_{2n+1})$ or $U_{q}(so_{2n})$-module.

entry.title: Double Construction for Crossed Hopf Coalgebras
entry.summary: We provide an analog of the Drinfeld quantum double construction in the context of crossed Hopf group coalgebras introduced by Turaev. We prove that, provided the base group is finite, the double of a semisimple crossed Hopf group coalgebra is both modular and unimodular.

entry.title: The Garden of Quantum Spheres
entry.summary: A list of known quantum spheres of dimension one, two and three is presented.
entry.arxiv:comment: To appear in: Banach Center Publications

entry.title: From entangled codipterous coalgebras to coassociative manifolds
entry.summary: We construct from coassociative coalgebras, bialgebras, Hopf algebras, new objects such as Poisson algebras, Leibniz algebras defined by J-L Loday and M. Ronco and explore the notion of coassociative manifolds.

entry.title: Quantum torsors with fewer axioms
entry.summary: We give a definition of a noncommutative torsor by a subset of the axioms previously given by Grunspan. We show that noncommutative torsors are an equivalent description of Hopf-Galois objects (without specifying the Hopf algebra). In particular, this shows that the endomorphism of a torsor featuring in Grunspan's definition is redundant.

entry.title: Linkable Dynkin diagrams and Quasi-isomorphisms for finite dimensional pointed Hopf algebras
entry.summary: A detailed presentation of the results obtained during my Ph.D. research. The main investigations concern explicit descriptions of classes of finite dimensional pointed Hopf algebras and their quasi-isomorphism types.

entry.title: Open and Closed String field theory interpreted in classical Algebraic Topology
entry.summary: There is an interpretation of open string field theory in algebraic topology. An interpretation of closed string field theory can be deduced from this open string theory to obtain as well the interpretation of open and closed string field theory combined.

entry.title: Free quantum analogues of the first fundamental theorems of invariant theory
entry.summary: We formulate and prove a free quantum analogue of the first fundamental theorems of invariant theory. More precisely, the polynomial functions algebras are replaced by free algebras, while the universal cosovereign Hopf algebras play the role of the general linear group.

entry.title: Strict quantizations of almost Poisson manifolds
entry.summary: We show the existence of (non-Hermitian) strict quantization for every almost Poisson manifold.

entry.title: Flabby strict deformation quantizations and K-groups
entry.summary: We construct examples of flabby strict deformation quantizations not preserving K-groups. This answers a question of Rieffel negatively.
entry.arxiv:comment: 6 pages, minor changes. To appear in K-theory

entry.title: Constructing r-matrices on simple Lie superalgebras
entry.summary: We construct r-matrices for simple Lie superalgebras with non-degenerate Killing forms using Belavin-Drinfeld type triples. This construction gives us the standard r-matrices and some nonstandard ones.
entry.arxiv:journal_ref: Revised and final version at: J. Algebra, 282 (2004), pp.83-102

entry.title: Differential equations and conformal field theories
entry.summary: We discuss the recent results of the author on the existence of systems of differential equations for chiral genus-zero and genus-one correlation functions in conformal field theories.

entry.title: Correspondence between Young walls and Young tableaux realizations of crystal bases for the classical Lie algebras
entry.summary: We give a 1-1 correspondence with the Young wall realization and the Young tableau realization of the crystal bases for the classical Lie algebras.

entry.title: Constructible characters and canonical bases
entry.summary: We give closed formulas for all vectors of the canonical basis of a level 2 irreducible integrable representation of $U_v(sl_\infty)$. These formulas coincide at v=1 with Lusztig's formulas for the constructible characters of the Iwahori-Hecke algebras of type B and D.

entry.title: Generalized Virasoro and Super-Virasoro Algebras and Modules of the Intermediate Series
entry.summary: Generalized Virasoro algebras (defined as the universal central extension of some generalized Witt algebras) and super-Virasoro algebras and modules of the intermediate series are studied and discussed.

entry.title: Structure of the Lie algebras related to those of block
entry.summary: We determine the isomorphism classes of the first family of infinite dimensional simple Lie algebras recently introduced by Xu. The structure space of these algebras is given explicitly. The derivations of these algebras are also determined.

entry.title: Derivations and structure of the Lie algebras of Xu type
entry.summary: We determine the derivation algebras and the isomorphism classes of a family of the simple Lie algebras introduced recently by Xu [Manuscripta Math 100 (1999), 489-518]. The structure space of these algebras is given explicitly.

entry.title: Hopf algebras with trace and representations
entry.summary: We study the restriction of representations of Cayley-Hamilton algebras to subalgebras. This theory is applied to determine tensor products and branching rules for representations of quantum groups at roots of 1.

entry.title: A new cohomology theory associated to deformations of Lie algebra morphisms
entry.summary: We introduce a new cohomology theory related to deformations of Lie algebra morphisms. This notion involves simultaneous deformations of two Lie algebras and a homomorphism between them.

author.name: Yael Fregier
author.arxiv:affiliation: Centre de Physique Theorique de Luminy

entry.title: sl(3) link homology
entry.summary: We define a bigraded homology theory whose Euler characteristic is the quantum sl(3) link invariant.
entry.arxiv:comment: Published by Algebraic and Geometric Topology at http://www.maths.warwick.ac.uk/agt/AGTVol4/agt-4-45.abs.html

entry.title: On the semisolvability of semisimple Hopf algebras of low dimension
entry.summary: We prove that every semisimple Hopf algebra of dimension less than 60 over an algebraically closed field k of characteristic zero is either upper or lower semisolvable up to a cocycle twist.
entry.arxiv:comment: revised version, change in the main result

entry.title: The Uniqueness Of Integrals On Hopf Algebras, A categorical approach
entry.summary: We propose a new method to investigate the dimension of the space of integrals on a Hopf algebra $H$ and other properties of $H$-comodules.

entry.title: Examples of twisted cyclic cocycles from covariant differential calculi
entry.summary: For two covariant differential *-calculi, the twisted cyclic cocycle associated with the volume form is represented in terms of commutators [F,\rho(x)] for some self-adjoint operator F and some *-representation $\rho$ of the underlying *-algebra.

entry.title: Affine Kac-Moody algebras, integrable systems and their deformations
entry.summary: This is the text of the Hermann Weyl Prize lecture given by the author at the XXIV Colloquium on Group Theoretical Methods in Physics, Paris, July 2002 (to appear in the Proceedings of the Colloquium).

entry.title: Deformation quantization and quantum coadjoint orbits of SL(2,R)
entry.summary: In this article we describe the coadjoint orbits of SL(2,$\mathbb R$). After choosing polarizations for each orbits, we pointed out the corresponding quantum coadjoint orbits and therefore unitary representations of SL(2,$\mathbb R$) via deformation quantization.

entry.title: A map for simultaneous measurements for a quantum logic
entry.summary: In this paper we will study a function of simultaneus measurements for quantum events (s-map) which will be compared with the conditional states on an orthomodular lattice as a basic structure for quantum logic.

entry.title: Path model for quantum loop modules of fundamental type
entry.summary: For a certain class of simple integrable modules of level zero over a quantised affine algebra, we establish the existence of a pseudo-crystal basis and show that such a basis admits a combinatorial realisation in the framework of the path model of Littelmann.

entry.title: Fock space representations and crystal bases for $C_n^{(1)}$
entry.summary: We describe the Fock space representations and crystal bases for the affine Kac-Moody Lie algebra of type $C_n^{(1)}$ in terms of coloured Young diagrams.

entry.title: Invariant *-products on coadjoint orbits and the Shapovalov pairing
entry.summary: We give an explicit formula for invariant *-products on a wide class of coadjoint orbits. The answer is expressed in terms of the Shapovalov pairing for generalized Verma modules.

entry.title: Khovanov's conjecture over Z[c]
entry.summary: We disprove the conjecture of M. Khovanov (math.QA/9908171) on the functoriality of his link homology with polynomial coefficients. This is in contrast to the case of integer coefficients, where functoriality was proved in math.GT/0206303 .

entry.title: Crystal bases and monomials for $U_q(G_2)$-modules
entry.summary: In this paper, we give a new realization of crystal bases for irreducible highest weight modules over $U_q(G_2)$ in terms of monomials. We also discuss the natural connection between the monomial realization and tableau realization.

entry.title: A categorical construction of 2-dimensional extended Topological Quantum Field Theory
entry.summary: In this paper we propose a naive construction of 2-dimensional extended topological quantum field theories (TQFTs), which can be further generalized to the higher-dimension extended TQFTs.

entry.title: Level zero fundamental representations over quantized affine algebras and Demazure modules
entry.summary: We show that the finite-dimensional fundamental module over a quantized affine algebra is isomorphic to a Demazure module of a higest weight module of level one as a module over a quantized classical universal enveloping algebra.

entry.title: Fixed Point Subalgebras of Extended Affine Lie Algebras
entry.summary: It is shown that the fixed point subalgebra of an EALA under a finite order automorphism (satisfying certain properties) is a sum of EALA's, an abelian subalgebra, and a subspace which is contained in the centralizer of the core.

entry.title: On the Dynamics of the Self Gravitating Ellipsoid in N dimensions and its Deformation Quantization
entry.summary: In this paper is constructed an algebraic deformation quantization of the coadjoint orbits of the group G semidirect product of the symmetric n by n matrices and GL(n). This group is linked to the dynamics of the self gravitating ellipsoid.

entry.title: Isomorphisme de Duflo et la cohomologie tangentielle
entry.summary: In the present note we show that the Duflo isomorphism extends to an isomorphism of associative algebras of tangential cohomologies. This result confirms the B.Shoikhet's conjecture.

entry.title: Fusion rules for the vertex operator algebras M(1)^+ and V_L^+
entry.summary: The fusion rules for the vertex operator algebras M(1)^+ (of any rank) and V_L^+ (for any positive definite even lattice L) are determined completely.

entry.title: Canonical bases for quantum generalized Kac-Moody algebra
entry.summary: We construct a canonical basis for quantum generalized Kac-Moody algebra via semisimple perverse sheaves on varieties of representations of quivers. We compare this basis with the one recently defined purely algebraically by Jeong, Kang and Kashiwara.

entry.title: Construction of Nijenhuis operators and dendriform trialgebras
entry.summary: Nijenhuis operators are constructed from particular bialgebras called dendriform- Nijenhuis bialgebras. It turns out that such operators commute with TD-operators, kind of Baxter-Rota operators, and therefore closely related to dendriform trialgebras. Examples are given.

entry.title: Homological realization of Nakajima varieties and Weyl group actions
entry.summary: We describe points on Nakajima varieties and Weyl group actions on them via complexes of semisimple and projective modules over certain finite-dimensional algebras.

entry.title: Vector valued spherical functions and Macdonald-Koornwinder polynomials
entry.summary: We interpret the five parameter family of Macdonald-Koornwinder polynomials as vector valued spherical functions on quantum Grassmannians.

entry.title: Homological Dimension of Crossed Products
entry.summary: We obtain that the global dimensions of $R$ and the crossed product $R # _\sigma H$ are the same; meantime, their weak dimensions are also the same, when $H$ is finite-dimensional semisimple and cosemisimple Hopf algebra.

entry.title: The Radicals of Hopf Module Algebras
entry.summary: The characterization of $H$-prime radical is given in many ways. Meantime, the relations between the radical of smash product $R # H$ and the $H$-radical of Hopf module algebra $R$ are obtained.

entry.title: Commutation relations among generic quantum minors in $Ø_q(M_n(k))$
entry.summary: In this paper we compute explicit formulas for the commutation relations among quantum minors in the quantum matrix bialgebra $\cO_q(M_n(k))$.

entry.title: Frobenius-Schur indicators for a class of fusion categories
entry.summary: We give an explicit description, up to gauge equivalence, of group-theoretical quasi-Hopf algebras. We use this description to compute the Frobenius-Schur indicators for group-theoretical fusion categories.

entry.title: Geometric Crystals on Unipotent Groups and Generalized Young Tableaux
entry.summary: We define geometric/unipotent crystal structure on unipotent subgroups of semi-simple algebraic groups. We shall show that in $A_n$-case, their ultra-discretizations coincide with crystals obtained by generalizing Young tableaux.

entry.title: The Kronecker quiver and bases of quantum affine sl_2
entry.summary: We compare various bases of the affine quantum group $\mathbfU^ (\hat\mathfrak{sl}_2)$ in the context of the Kronecker quiver, and relate them to the Drinfeld presentation.
entry.arxiv:comment: 15 pages, presentation improved and some references added

entry.title: Finite dimensional rank 2 Nichols algebras of diagonal type II: Classification
entry.summary: The method of subquotients is developed and used to determine all finite dimensional rank 2 Nichols algebras of diagonal type over an arbitrary field of characteristic zero. Key Words: Hopf algebra, Nichols algebra

entry.title: A categorical and diagrammatical approach to Temperley-Lieb algebras
entry.summary: Algebraic basics on Temperley-Lieb algebras are proved in an elementary and straightforward way with the help of tensor categories behind them.

entry.title: Fiber Functors on Temperley-Lieb Categories
entry.summary: Fiber functors on Temperley-Lieb categories are investigated with the help of classification results on non-degenerate bilinear forms. The case of unitary fiber functors is also considered.

entry.title: Noncommutative Double Bruhat cells and their factorizations
entry.summary: In the present paper we study noncommutative double Bruhat cells. Our main results are explicit positive matrix factorizations in the cells via quasiminors of matrices with noncommutative coefficents.

entry.title: Quantized trace rings
entry.summary: The general linear group acts on $m$-tuples of $N\times N$ matrices by simultaneous conjugation. Quantum deformations of the corresponding rings of invariants and the so-called trace rings are investigated.

entry.title: Coalgebras of words and phrases
entry.summary: We introduce two constructions of a coassociative comultiplication in the algebra of phrases in a given alphabet. As a preliminary step we give two constructions of a pre-Lie comultiplication in the module generated by words.

entry.title: On certain integral tensor categories and integral TQFTs
entry.summary: We construct certain tensor categories that are dominated by finitely many simple objects. Objects in these categories are modules over rings of algebra integers. We show how to obtain TQFTs defined over algebra integers from these categories.

entry.title: Produit de Moyal stochastique sur l'espace de Wiener
entry.summary: We propose a stochastic extension of deformation quantization on a Hilbert space. The Moyal product is defined in this context on the space of functionals belonging to all of the Sobolev spaces of the Malliavin calculus.

entry.title: The Eigenfunctions of the q-Harmonic Oscillator on the Quantum Line
entry.summary: We construct a complete set of eigenfunctions of the q-deformed harmonic oscillator on the quantum line. In particular the eigenfunctions corresponding to the non-Fock part of the spectrum will be constructed.

entry.title: Quantum groups and non-commutative complex analysis
entry.summary: The maximum principle for holomirphic functions in the quantum ball is formulated. A proof can be found in [8] (see the bibliography).

entry.title: Link homology and Frobenius extensions
entry.summary: We explain how rank two Frobenius extensions of commutative rings lead to link homology theories and discuss relations between these theories, Bar-Natan theories, equivariant cohomology and the Rasmussen invariant.

entry.title: On some anticyclic operads
entry.summary: Some binary quadratic operads are endowed with anticyclic structures and their characteristic functions as anticyclic operads are determined, or conjectured in one case.
entry.arxiv:comment: Published by Algebraic and Geometric Topology at http://www.maths.warwick.ac.uk/agt/AGTVol5/agt-5-4.abs.html

entry.title: Quantum conjugacy classes of simple matrix groups
entry.summary: Let $G$ be a simple complex classical group and $\g$ its Lie algebra. Let $\U_\hbar(\g)$ be the Drinfeld-Jimbo quantization of the universal enveloping algebra $\U(\g)$. We construct an explicit $\U_\hbar(\g)$-equivariant quantization of conjugacy classes of $G$ with Levi subgroups as the stabilizers.

entry.title: A q-analog of the Racah polynomials and the q-algebra SUq(2)
entry.summary: We study some q-analogues of the Racah polynomials and some of their applications in the theory of representation of quantum algebras.

entry.title: Geometry of Quantum Spheres
entry.summary: Spectral triples on the q-deformed spheres of dimension two and three are reviewed.

entry.title: On the Drinfeld generators of grt_1(k) and Gamma-functions for associators
entry.summary: We prove that the Drinfeld generators of grt_1(k) span the image of this Lie algebra in the abelianization of the commutator of the free Lie algebra with two generators. We show that this result implies Gamma-function formulas for arbitrary associators.

entry.title: Continuous and Twisted L_infinity Morphisms
entry.summary: The purpose of this paper is to develop a suitable notion of continuous L_infinity morphism between DG Lie algebras, and to study twists of such morphisms.
entry.arxiv:comment: 29 pages, xypic figures. Final version, to appear in J. Pure Appl. Algebra

entry.title: Commutation relations for arbitrary quantum minors
entry.summary: Complete sets of commutation relations for arbitrary pairs of quantum minors are computed, with explicit coefficients in closed form.
entry.arxiv:comment: 35 pages; new introduction and additional references; to appear in Pacific J. Math

entry.title: Super Solutions of the Dynamical Yang-Baxter Equation
entry.summary: We classify super dynamical r-matrices with zero weight, thus extending earlier results of Etingof and Varchenko to the graded case.
entry.arxiv:journal_ref: Revised and final version at: Proc. Amer. Math. Soc. 134 (2006), pp.2521-2531

entry.title: Toy operads
entry.summary: Didactic operadic entertainment for pedestrians. The following visual toys are included: operad of little squares, operad of planar rooted trees, and an operad algebra example.

entry.title: A note on noncommutative Poisson structures
entry.summary: We introduce a new type of noncommutative Poisson structure on associative algebras. It induces Poisson structures on the moduli spaces classifying semisimple modules. Path algebras of doubled quivers and preprojective algebras have noncommutative Poisson structures given by the necklace Lie algebra.

entry.title: Algebres de Frobenius-Virasoro
entry.summary: In this note we associate to each Frobenius algebra a vertex algebra, the simplest example being the Virasoro vertex algebra. This construction is analogous to the procedure which associates to a Lie algebra with an invariant bilinear form the vacuum module over the corresponding Kac-Moody Lie algebra.

entry.title: Tensor categories and vacant double groupoids
entry.summary: We show that fusion categories $\Rep(\ku^{\sigma}_{\tau} \Tc)$ of representations of the weak Hopf algebra coming from a vacant double groupoid $\Tc$ and a pair $(\sigma, \tau)$ of compatible 2-cocyles are group-theoretical.

entry.title: Generating functions for ranks of pre-modular categories
entry.summary: We derive generating functions for the ranks of pre-modular categories associated to quantum groups at roots of unity.
entry.arxiv:comment: This paper is for the convenience of other researchers and is not intended for "stand-alone" publication

entry.title: Quantum Lobachevsky Planes
entry.summary: We classify all SL(2,R)-covariant Poisson structures on the Lobachevsky plane with respect to all multiplicative Poisson structures on SL(2,R) and describe Quantisations for all these Poisson structures.

entry.title: On comonadicity of the extension-of-scalars functors
entry.summary: A criterion for comonadicity of the extension-of- scalars functor associated to an extension of (not necessarily commutative) rings is given. As an application of this criterion, some known results on the comonadicity of such functors are obtained.

entry.title: Included-row exchange principle for quantum minors
entry.summary: The main theorem of the paper allows to generalize a class of identities among the quantum minors for quantum linear groups to similar identities but with the row labels of the quantum minors involved permuted.

entry.title: On deformation quantization of Dirac structures
entry.summary: Motivated by the problem of transverse deformation quantization of foliated manifolds, we describe a quantization of Dirac structures (more precisely, of those that are formal deformations of regular ones) to stacks of algebroids in the sense of Kontsevich.

entry.title: On some quantum bounded symmetric domains
entry.summary: In the framework of quantum group theory we obtain a noncommutative analog for the algebra of functions in a bounded symmetric domain, endowed with a whole symmetry. Also we provide a construction for its faithfull irreducible representation and an invariant integral over the bounded symmetric domain.

entry.title: Alcove path and Nichols-Woronowicz model of $K$-theory on flag varieties
entry.summary: This paper has been withdrawn.

entry.title: Characters of Crossed Modules and Premodular Categories
entry.summary: A general procedure is presented which associates to a finite crossed module a premodular category, generalizing the representation categories of a finite group and of its double, and the extent to which the resulting category fails to be modular is explained.

entry.title: Unitary representations of the extended affine Lie algebra $\widetilde{\frak{gl}_{3}(\bc_q)}$
entry.summary: We present modules for the extended affine Lie algebra $\widetilde{\frak{gl}_{3}(\bc_q)}$ by using the idea of free fields. A necessary and sufficient condition for the modules being unitary is given.

entry.title: Crystal graphs for Lie superalgebras and Cauchy decomposition
entry.summary: We discuss Cauchy type decompositions of crystal graphs for general linear Lie superalgebras. More precisely, we consider bicrystal graph structures on various sets of matrices of non-negative integers, and obtain their decompositions with explicit combinatorial isomorphisms.

entry.title: Inductive Construction of Nilpotent Modules of Quantum Groups at Roots of Unity
entry.summary: The purpose of this paper is to prove that we can construct all finite dimensional irreducible nilpotent modules of type 1 inductively by using Schnizer homomorphisms for quantum algebra at roots of unity of type A, B, C, D or G.

entry.title: Oriented Kauffman diagrams and universal quantum groups
entry.summary: The tensor categories of oriented Kauffman diagrams are studied with description of fiber functors on them as well as the associated Hopf algebras.
entry.arxiv:comment: 14 pages, 3 figures, added a reference for section 5

entry.title: A Note on the Bar-Natan Skein Module
entry.summary: We introduce a new skein module for three manifolds based on properly embedded surfaces and their relations introduced by D.Bar-Natan, and modified by M.Khovanov. We compute the structure of the modules for some manifolds, including Seifert fibred manifolds.

entry.title: B(0,N)-graded Lie superalgebras coordinatized by quantum tori
entry.summary: We use a fermionic extension of the bosonic module to obtain a class of B(0,N)-graded Lie superalgebras with nontrivial central extensions.

entry.title: Quasideterminants and q-commuting minors
entry.summary: We present two new proofs of the the important q-commuting property holding among certain pairs of quantum minors of an n x n q-generic matrix. The first uses elementary quasideterminantal arithmetic; the second involves paths in an edge-weighted directed graph.

entry.title: Cartan calculi on the quantum superplane
entry.summary: Cartan calculi on the extended quantum superplane are given. To this end, the noncommutative differential calculus on the extended quantum superplane is extended by introducing inner derivations and Lie derivatives.

entry.title: Quantised coordinate rings of semisimple groups are unique factorisation domains
entry.summary: We show that the quantum coordinate ring of a semisimple group is a unique factorisation domain in the sense of Chatters and Jordan in the case where the deformation parameter q is a transcendental element.

entry.title: Supersymmetric vertex algebras
entry.summary: We define and study the structure of SUSY Lie conformal and vertex algebras. This leads to effective rules for computations with superfields.

entry.title: The asymptotic behavior of q-exponentials and q-Bessel functions
entry.summary: The connections between q-Bessel functions of three types and q-exponential of three types are established. The q-exponentials and the q-Bessel functions are represented as the Laurent series. The asymptotic behaviour of the q-exponentials and the q-Bessel functions is investigated.

entry.title: Bosonic formulas for affine branching functions
entry.summary: In this paper we derive two bosonic (alternating sign) formulas for branching functions for general affine Kac-Moody Lie algebra $\g$. Both formulas are given in terms of the Weyl group and string functions of $\g$.

entry.title: Center of Infinitesimal Hecke Algebra of $sl_2$
entry.summary: In this notes we describe the center and derivations of the Infinitesimal Hecke algebra of $sl_2$ by means of elementary computations.

entry.title: Link homology and categorification
entry.summary: This is a short survey of algebro-combinatorial link homology theories which have the Jones polynomial and other link polynomials as their Euler characteristics.
entry.arxiv:journal_ref: Proceedings of the ICM-2006, Madrid, vol.2 989--999

entry.title: R-matrices and Hopf algebra quotients
entry.summary: We study a natural construction of Hopf algebra quotients canonically associated to an R-matrix in a finite dimensional Hopf algebra. We apply this construction to show that a quasitriangular Hopf algebra whose dimension is odd and square-free is necessarily cocommutative.

entry.title: On non-commutative analytic spaces over non-archimedean fields
entry.summary: The paper is devoted to examples of non-commutative analytic spaces over valuation fields. Those include non-commutative affine spaces, quantum tori, K3 surfaces.

entry.title: Noncommutative complex analytic spaces
entry.summary: In this paper, we define NC complex spaces as complex spaces together with a structure sheaf of associative algebras in such a way that the abelization of the structure sheaf is the sheaf of holomorphic functions.

entry.title: Mickelsson algebras and Zhelobenko operators
entry.summary: We construct a family of automorphisms of Mickelsson algebra, satisfying braid group relations. The construction uses 'Zhelobenko cocycle' and includes the dynamical Weyl group action as a particular case.

entry.title: Irreducible Modules for the Quantum Affine Algebra $U_q(g)$ and its Borel subalgebra $U_q(g)^{\geq 0}$
entry.summary: We prove a bijection between finite-dimensional irreducible modules for an arbitrary quantum affine algebra $U_q(g)$ and finite-dimensional irreducible modules for its Borel subalgebra $U_q(g)^{\geq 0}$.

entry.title: Périodicité de Knörrer étendue
entry.summary: We study the deformation theory aspects of Matricial Factorizations, possibly with an orthogonal or symplectic structure. We discuss and extend the Kn\"orrer and Hori-Walcher periodicity theorems

entry.title: Deformations of Azumaya algebras
entry.summary: In this paper we compute the deformation theory of a special class of algebras, namely of Azumaya algebras on a manifold ($C^{\infty}$ or complex analytic).

entry.title: Fermionic forms and quiver varieties
entry.summary: We prove a formula relating the fermionic forms and the Poincare polynomials of quiver varieties associated to a finite quiver. Applied to quivers of type ADE, our result implies a version of the fermionic conjecture of Lusztig.

entry.title: Lecture notes on Geometric Crystals and their combinatorial analogues
entry.summary: This is an exposition of the results on Geometric crystals and the associated Kashiwara crystal bases (presented by the first author in RIMS, August 2004)
entry.arxiv:comment: AmsLatex, 10 pages. To appear in the proceedings of CAIS workshop

entry.title: A generalization of the Capelli identity
entry.summary: We prove a generalization of the Capelli identity. As an application we obtain an isomorphism of the Bethe subalgebras actions under the (gl(N),gl(M)) duality.

entry.title: Khovanov homology and Rasmussen's s-invariants for pretzel knots
entry.summary: We calculated the rational Khovanov homology of some class of pretzel knots, by using the spectral sequence constructed by P. Turner. Moreover, we determined the Rasmussen's s-invariant of almost of pretzel knots with three pretzels.

entry.title: Categorification of level two representations of quantum sl(N) via generalized arc rings
entry.summary: We build extensions of the arc rings, relate their centers to the cohomology rings of the Springer varieties, and categorify all level two representations of quantum sl(N).

entry.title: Strong homotopy properads
entry.summary: In this paper we prove that the structure of strong homotopy properad transfers over left homotopy inverses and give explicit formulae for the induced structure.
entry.arxiv:journal_ref: Int Math Res Notices (2007) Vol. 2007, article ID rnm044

entry.title: Proof of the De Concini-Kac-Procesi conjecture
entry.summary: In this paper we prove a conjecture by De Concini, Kac and Procesi \cite{CP} (Corollary \ref{conj}): The dimension of any $M\in U_q-\mood^\chi$ is divisible by $l^{codim_\mathcal{B}\mathcal{B}_\chi}$.

entry.title: Quantization of generalized Virasoro-like algebras
entry.summary: In a recent paper by the authors, Lie bialgebras structures of generalized Virasoro-like type were considered. In this paper, the explicit formula of the quantization of generalized Virasoro-like algebras is presented.

entry.title: Noncommutative geometry and path integrals
entry.summary: We argue that there should exist a "noncommutative Fourier transform" which should identify functions of noncommutative variables (say, of matrices of indeterminate size) and ordinary functions or measures on the space of paths. Some examples are considered.

entry.title: Monoidal functor categories and graphic Fourier transforms
entry.summary: This article represents a preliminary attempt to link Kan extensions, and some of their further developments, to Fourier theory and quantum algebra through *-autonomous monoidal categories and related structures.

entry.title: The representation-theoretic rank of the doubles of quasi-quantum groups
entry.summary: We compute the representation-theoretic rank of a finite dimensional quasi-Hopf algebra $H$ and of its quantum double $D(H)$, within the rigid braided category of finite dimensional left $D(H)$-modules.

entry.title: Affine Geometric Crystal of type $G^{(1)}_2$
entry.summary: We shall realize certain affine geometric crystal of type $G^{(1)}_2$ explicitly in the fundamental representation $W(\varpi_1)$. Its explicit form is rather complicated but still keeps a positive structure.

entry.title: Convergent noncommutative power series algebras and their finite dimensional representations
entry.summary: We define ''convergence'' for noncommutative power series and construct two topologies on the algebra of power series, convergent with respect to a positive radius. We indicate all finite dimensional continuous representations of this algebra and prove completeness for both topologies.

entry.title: On a "New" Deformation of GL(2)
entry.summary: We refute a recent claim in the literature of a "new" quantum deformation of GL(2).

entry.title: From operads and PROPs to Feynman Processes
entry.summary: Operads and PROPs are presented, together with examples and applications to quantum physics suggesting the structure of Feynman categories/PROPs and the corresponding algebras.

entry.title: Addendum to "On Super-Jordanian ${\cal U}_{\sf h}(sl(N|1))$ Algebra
entry.summary: We give a complete proof of the result (2.10) presented in our paper published in J. Phys. A: Math. Gen. 39 (2006) 8307.

entry.title: Deformations of gerbes on smooth manifolds
entry.summary: We identify the 2-groupoid of deformations of a gerbe on a smooth manifold with the Deligne 2-groupoid of a corresponding twist of the DGLA of local Hochschild cochains on infinite jets of smooth functions.

entry.title: Pentagon and hexagon equations
entry.summary: The author will prove that Drinfel'd's pentagon equation implies his two hexagon equations in the Lie algebra, pro-unipotent, pro-$l$ and pro-nilpotent contexts.

entry.title: On the semisimplicity of cyclotomic Baruer algebras, II
entry.summary: In this paper, we give a necessary and sufficient condition for a cyclotomic Brauer algebra being semisimple. This generalizes previous result for a Brauer algebra.

entry.title: A dilemma of nonequivalent definitions of differential operators in noncommutative geometry
entry.summary: In contrast with differential operators on modules over commutative and graded commutative rings, there is no satisfactory notion of a differential operator in noncommutative geometry.

entry.title: Non-commutative quasi-Hamiltonian spaces
entry.summary: In this paper we introduce non-commutative analogues for the quasi-Hamiltonian $G$-spaces introduced by Alekseev, Malkin and Meinrenken. We outline the connection with the non-commutative analogues of quasi-Poisson algebras which the author had introduced earlier.

entry.title: Nichols-Woronowicz model of coinvariant algebra of complex reflection groups
entry.summary: We give a model of the coinvariant algebra of the complex reflection groups as a subalgebra of a braided Hopf algebra called Nichols-Woronowicz algebra.

entry.title: Entwining Structures in Monoidal Catrgories
entry.summary: Interpreting entwining structures as special instances of J. Beck's distributive law, the concept of entwining module can be generalized for the setting of arbitrary monoidal category. In this paper, we use the distributive law formalism to extend in this setting basic properties of entwining modules.

entry.title: Twisted Dirac Operators over Quantum Spheres
entry.summary: We construct new families of spectral triples over quantum spheres, with a particular attention focused on the standard Podles quantum sphere and twisted Dirac operators.

entry.title: Involutory quasi-Hopf algebras
entry.summary: We introduce and investigate the basic properties of an involutory (dual) quasi-Hopf algebra. We also study the representations of an involutory quasi-Hopf algebra and prove that an involutory dual quasi-Hopf algebra with non-zero integral is cosemisimple.

entry.title: On the antipode of a co-Frobenius (co)quasitriangular Hopf algebra
entry.summary: We extend to the co-Frobenius case a result of Drinfeld and Radford related to the fourth power of the antipode of a finite dimensional (co)quasitriangular Hopf algebra.

entry.title: R-Matrix Poisson Algebras and Their Deformations
entry.summary: We classify in this paper Poisson structures on modules over semisimple Lie algebras arising from classical r-matrices. We then study their quantizations and the relation to classical invariant theory.

entry.title: Equivariant Lefschetz number of differential operators
entry.summary: Let $G$ be a compact Lie group acting on a compact complex manifold $M$. We prove a trace density formula for the $G$-Lefschetz number of a differential operator on $M$. We generalize Engeli and Felder's recent results to orbifolds.

entry.title: Symmetric linear functions of the restricted quantum group $\bar{U}_qsl_2(\mathbb{C})$
entry.summary: We determine a set of primitive idempotents and the basic algebra of the restricted quantum group $\bar{U}_qsl_2(\mathbb{C})$. As a result, we can show the dimension of the space of symmetric linear functions of $\bar{U}_qsl_2(\mathbb{C})$ is $3p-1$

entry.title: Mapping Class Groups do not have Kazhdan's Property (T)
entry.summary: We prove that the mapping class group of a closed oriented surface of genus at least two does not have Kazhdan's property (T).

entry.title: Double affine Hecke algebra in logarithmic conformal field theory
entry.summary: We construct the representation of Double Affine Hecke Algebra whose symmetrization gives the center of the quantum group U_q(sl(2)) and by Kazhdan--Lusztig duality the Verlinde algebra of (1,p) models of logarithmic conformal field theory.

entry.title: Tetrahedron equations and nilpotent subalgebras of U_q(sl_n)
entry.summary: A relation between q-oscillator R-matrix of the tetrahedron equation and decompositions of Poinkare-Birkhoff-Witt type bases for nilpotent subalgebras of U_q(sl_n) is observed.

entry.title: Finite vertex algebras and nilpotence
entry.summary: I show that simple finite vertex algebras are commutative, and that the Lie conformal algebra structure underlying a reduced (i.e., without nilpotent elements) finite vertex algebra is nilpotent.
entry.arxiv:journal_ref: Journal of Pure and Applied Algebra 212 (4), 669-688 (2008)

entry.title: Rankin-Cohen Deformations and Representation Theory
entry.summary: In this paper, we use the unitary representation theory of $SL_2(\mathbb R)$ to understand the Rankin-Cohen brackets for modular forms. Then we use this interpretation to study the corresponding deformation problems that Paula Cohen, Yuri Manin and Don Zagier initiated. Two uniqueness results are established.

entry.title: A universal deformation formula for Connes-Moscovici's Hopf algebra without any projective structure
entry.summary: We construct a universal deformation formula for Connes-Moscovici's Hopf algebra without any projective structure using Fedosov's quantization of symplectic diffeomorphisms.

entry.title: SUSY Lattice Vertex Algebras
entry.summary: We construct and study SUSY lattice vertex algebras. As a simple example, we obtain the simple vertex algebra associated to the vertex algebra $V_c(N3)$ of central charge $c=3/2$, as the SUSY lattice vertex algebra associated to $\mathbb{Z}$ with bilinear form $(a,b) = 2ab$.

entry.title: Lectures on the three--dimensional non--commutative spheres
entry.summary: These are expanded notes for a short course given at the Universidad Nacional de La Plata. They aim at giving a self-contained account of the results of Alain Connes and Michel Dubois--Violette.

entry.title: Addendum to ``Canonical bases for quantum generalized Kac-Moody algebras''
entry.summary: We provide some necessary details to several arguments appearing in our previous paper ``Canonical bases for quantum generalized Kac-Moody algebras''. We also make the link with some other work on the same subject.

entry.title: Equations aux q-differences et fibres vectoriels holomorphes sur la courbe elliptique C^*/q^Z
entry.summary: Nous presentons diverses applications des fibres vectoriels aux equations aux q-differences, dans la lignee de la correspondance de Weil. (We present some applications of vector bundles to $q$-difference equtions, in continuation of Weil's correspondance.)

entry.title: The q-analogue of the wild fundamental group (II)
entry.summary: In [RS1], we defined q-analogues of alien derivations and stated their basic properties. In this paper, we prove the density theorem and the freeness theorem announced in loc. cit. [RS1] Ramis J.-P. and Sauloy J., 2007. The q-analogue of the wild fundamental group (I)

entry.title: Heisenberg modules over real multiplication noncommutative tori and related algebraic structures
entry.summary: We review some aspects of the theory of noncommutative two-tori with real multiplication focusing on the role played by Heisenberg groups in the definition of algebraic structures associated to these noncommutative spaces.

entry.title: Representation theory of liftings of quantum planes
entry.summary: We systematically determine the regular representations, quivers and representation type of all liftings of two-dimensional quantum linear spaces.

entry.title: Duality Theorem and Hom Functor in Braided Tensor Categories
entry.summary: Blatter-Montgomery duality theorem is generalized into braided tensor categories. It is shown that $Hom(V,W)$ is a braided Yetter-Drinfeld module for any two braided Yetter-Drinfeld modules $V$ and $W$.

entry.title: An Example of Constructing Versal Deformation for Leibniz Algebras
entry.summary: In this work we compute a versal deformation of the three dimensional nilpotent Leibniz algebra over $\mathbb{C}$, defined by the nontrivial brackets $[e_1,e_3]=e_2$ and $[e_3,e_3]=e_1$.

entry.title: Simple Jordan conformal superalgebras
entry.summary: We classify simple finite Jordan conformal superalgebras and establish preliminary results for the classification of simple finite Jordan pseudoalgebras.

entry.title: Leading coefficients of Kazhdan--Lusztig polynomials and fully commutative elements
entry.summary: Let $W$ be a Coxeter group of type $\widetilde{A}_{n-1}$. We show that the leading coefficient, $\mu(x, w)$, of the Kazhdan--Lusztig polynomial $P_{x, w}$ is always equal to 0 or 1 if $x$ is fully commutative (and $w$ is arbitrary).

entry.title: Left-symmetric Superalgebra Structures on the Super-Virasoro Algebras
entry.summary: In this paper, we classify the compatible left-symmetric superalgebra structures on the super-Virasoro algebras satisfying certain natural conditions.
entry.arxiv:comment: 13 pages, To appear in Pacific Journal of Mathematics

entry.title: The Hopf algebra structure of the Z$_3$-graded quantum supergroup GL$_{q,j}(1|1)$
entry.summary: In this work, we give some features of the Z$_3$-graded quantum supergroup.

entry.title: Poisson Hopf algebras associated to quantized enveloping algebras
entry.summary: We study certain Poisson structures related to quantized enveloping algebras. In particular, we give a description of the Poisson structure of a certain manifold associated to the ring of differential operators.

entry.title: The operad Lie is free
entry.summary: We show that the operad Lie is free as a non-symmetric operad. Then we study the generating series counting the operadic generators, finding a recursive formula for its coefficients, and showing that the asymptotic density of the operadic generators is 1/e.

entry.title: A New Proof for Classification of Irreducible Modules of a Hecke Algebra of Type $ A_n$
entry.summary: In this paper we give a new proof for the classification of irreducible modules of an affine Hecke algebra of type $A_n$, which was obtained by G. E. Murphy in 1995.

entry.title: The universal Hopf algebra associated with a Hopf-Lie-Rinehart algebra
entry.summary: We introduce a notion of Hopf-Lie-Rinehart algebra and show that the universal algebra of a Hopf-Lie-Rinehart algebra acquires an ordinary Hopf algebra structure.

entry.title: Quantum group structure of the q-deformed $W$ algebra $\WW_q$
entry.summary: In this paper the q-deformed $W$ algebra $\WW_q$ is constructed, whose nontrivial quantum group structure is presented.

entry.title: Notes on link homology
entry.summary: This article consists of six lectures on the categorification of the Burau representation and on link homology groups which categorify the Jones and the HOMFLY-PT polynomial. The notes are based on the lecture course at the PCMI 2006 summer school in Park City, Utah.

entry.title: A diagrammatic approach to categorification of quantum groups II
entry.summary: We categorify one-half of the quantum group associated to an arbitrary Cartan datum.

entry.title: The Hochschild cohomology ring of the standard Podles quantum sphere
entry.summary: The cup and cap product in twisted Hochschild (co)homology is computed for the standard quantum 2-sphere and used to construct a cyclic 2-cocycle that represents the fundamental Hochschild class.

entry.title: On $G$--modular functor
entry.summary: In this paper, we extend the notion of modular functor and fusion category to what we called $G$ equivariant modular functor and $G$ equivariant fusion category, where $G$ is a finite group, and establish a correspondence between between these notions.

entry.title: On the tensor structure of BRST differential and it's application
entry.summary: In this paper,we compute tensor structure of BRST differential and use this tensor representation we give out $CL_{\infty}$ algebra differential and $GA_{\infty}$ differential which are generalization of Chevalley-Eilenberg differential and Hochchild differential respectively.

entry.title: A diagrammatic approach to categorification of quantum groups III
entry.summary: We categorify the idempotented form of quantum sl(n).
entry.arxiv:comment: 88 pages, LaTeX2e with xypic and pstricks macros, 3 eps files

entry.title: On the (ir)rationality of Kontsevich weights
entry.summary: We compute the weight of a Kontsevich graph in deformation quantization. Up to rationals, the result is Zeta(3)^2/Pi^6.

entry.title: Hecke-Clifford algebras and spin Hecke algebras III: the trigonometric type
entry.summary: The notion of trigonometric spin double affine Hecke algebras (tsDaHa) and trigonometric double affine Hecke-Clifford algebras (tDaHCa) associated to classical Weyl groups are introduced. The PBW basis property is established. An algebra isomorphism relating tDaHCa to tsDaHa is obtained.

entry.title: The 1,2-coloured HOMFLY-PT link homology
entry.summary: In this paper we define the 1,2-coloured HOMFLY-PT link homology and prove that it is a link invariant. We conjecture that this homology categorifies the coloured HOMFLY-PT polynomial for links whose components are labelled 1 or 2.

entry.title: The Model Of Paths For Generalized Kac-Moody Algebras
entry.summary: This submission has been withdrawn by arXiv administrators because of inappropriate authorship claims.
entry.arxiv:comment: This submission has been withdrawn by arXiv administrators because of inappropriate authorship claims

entry.title: The gl_2 Bethe algebra associated with a nilpotent element
entry.summary: To any 2x2-matrix K one assigns a commutative subalgebra B^{K}\subset U(gl_2[t]) called a Bethe algebra. We describe relations between the Bethe algebras, associated with the zero matrix and a nilpotent matrix.

entry.title: On formal codegrees of fusion categories
entry.summary: We prove a general result which implies that the global and Frobenius-Perron dimensions of a fusion category generate Galois invariant ideals in the ring of algebraic integers.
entry.arxiv:comment: 7 pages; example is added in the Introduction

entry.title: Hochschild homology of certain Soergel bimodules
entry.summary: In this paper we compute Hochschild homology of certain Soergel bimodules. Moreover, we describe explicitly the graded bimodule maps between Soergel bimodules. This computations are motivated by the categorifications of the colored HOMFLY-PT polynomial for links via Hochschild homology of Soergel bimodules.

entry.title: Discrete Liouville equation and Teichmüller theory
entry.summary: The relationship (both classical and quantum mechanical) between the discrete Liouville equation and Teichm\"uller theory is reviewed.
entry.arxiv:comment: 24 pages, 11 figures, submitted to Handbook in Teichm\"uller theory, minor corrections, references added

entry.title: Some remarks on the action of Quantum Isometry Groups
entry.summary: We give a new sufficient condition on a spectral triple to ensure that the quantum group of orientation and volume preserving isometries defined in \cite{qorient} has a $C^*$-action on the underlying $C^*$ algebra.
entry.arxiv:comment: submitted to the proceedings of a conference on quantum groups held in MPI, Bonn

entry.title: The categorified Diassociative cooperad
entry.summary: Using representations of quivers of type A, we define an anticyclic cooperad in the category of triangulated categories, which is a categorification of the linear dual of the Diassociative operad.

entry.title: The Haar State on SU_q(N)
entry.summary: Using matrix corepresentations on SL_q(N) and SU_q(N) we derive a Haar state on SU_q(N) which is nearly identical to that on SU_q(2). This allows us to create an orthonormal basis for the vector space of coordinate functions on SU_q(N).

entry.title: Exotic Bialgebras from 9x9 Unitary Braid Matrices
entry.summary: We present the exotic bialgebras that arise from a 9x9 unitary braid matrix.
entry.arxiv:comment: 14 pages, LATEX; v3: some rearrangement, added to appear

entry.title: 2-Representations and Equivariant 2D Topological Field Theories
entry.summary: Following ideas of G. Moore and G. Segal, we explicitly construct a G-equivariant topological field theory from an arbitrary Frobenius algebra equipped with a twisted action of a finite group G.

entry.title: Binomial theorem and exponent for variables commuting as $yx=qxy$
entry.summary: We state analogs of the binomial theorem and the exponential function for variables $x$, $y$ commuting as $yx=qxy$.

entry.title: Skein theory for the ADE planar algebras
entry.summary: We give generators and relations for the planar algebras corresponding to $ADE$ subfactors. We also give a basis and an algorithm to express an arbitrary diagram as a linear combination of these basis diagrams.

entry.title: On the Structure of Tame Graded Basic Hopf Algebras II
entry.summary: In continuation of the article \cite{L} we classify all radically graded basic Hopf algebras of tame type over an algebraically closed field of characteristic 0.

entry.title: A q-Analog of the Hua Equations
entry.summary: A necessary condition is established for a function to be in the image of a quantum Poisson integral operator associated to the Shilov boundary of the quantum matrix ball. A quantum analogue of the Hua equations is introduced.

entry.title: Pictures and Littlewood-Richardson crystals
entry.summary: We shall describe the one-to-one correspondence between the set of pictures and the set of Littlewood-Richardson crystals.
entry.arxiv:comment: 11pages, add some references and rewrite the last section

entry.title: Corrigendum to "The $q$-analogue of bosons and Hall algebras" and some remarks
entry.summary: A corrigendum of a former result on semisimplicity of the category of integrable modules of a q-boson algebra is given with a counter example.

entry.title: Symmetric functions for the generating matrix of Yangian of gl_n(C)
entry.summary: Analogues of classical combinatorial identities for elementary and homogeneous symmetric functions with coefficients in Yanigian are discussed. As a corollary, similar relations are deduced for shifted Schur functions.
entry.arxiv:journal_ref: The Electronic Journal of Combinatorics,Volume 16 (1), R128,2009

entry.title: Quantum vertex $C((t))$-algebras and quantum affine algebras
entry.summary: We give a summary of the theory of (weak) quantum vertex $\C((t))$-algebras and the association of quantum affine algebras with (weak) quantum vertex $\C((t))$-algebras.
entry.arxiv:comment: 14 pages, in the proceedings of the international conference "Finite Groups, Vertex Operator Algebras and Combinatorics," RIMS, January, 2009

entry.title: A remark on the topology of (n,n) Springer varieties
entry.summary: We prove a conjecture of Khovanov which identifies the topological space underlying the Springer variety of complete flags in C^2n stabilized by a fixed nilpotent operator with two Jordan blocks of size n.

entry.title: Admissible Pictures and Littlewood-Richardson Crystals
entry.summary: We present a one-to-one correspondence between the set of admissible pictures and the Littlewood-Richardson crystals. As a simple consequence, we shall show that the set of pictures does not depend on the choice of admissible orders.

entry.title: Higher dimensional operads
entry.summary: The theory of operads (May, cyclic, modular, PROPs, etc) is extended to include higher dimensional phenomena, i.e. operations between operations, mimicking the algebraic structure on varieties of arbitrary dimensions, having marked subvarieties of arbitrary codimension.

entry.title: The structure of parafermion vertex operator algebras: general case
entry.summary: The structure of the parafermion vertex operator algebra associated to an integrable highest weight module for any affine Kac-Moody algebra is studied. In particular, a set of generators for this algebra has been determined.

entry.title: A Survey on Rankin-Cohen Deformations
entry.summary: This is a survey about recent progress in Rankin-Cohen deformations. We explain a connection between Rankin-Cohen brackets and higher order Hankel forms.

entry.title: Integral HOMFLY-PT and sl(n)-link homology
entry.summary: Using the diagrammatic calculus for Soergel bimodules, developed by B. Elias and M. Khovanov, as well as Rasmussen's spectral sequence, we construct an integral version of HOMFLY-PT and sl(n)-link homology.

entry.title: The Khovanov-Lauda 2-category and categorifications of a level two quantum sl(n) representation
entry.summary: We construct 2-functors from a 2-category categorifying quantum sl(n) to 2-categories categorifying the irreducible representation of highest weight $ 2 \omega_k. $

entry.title: What is the higher dimensional infinitesimal groupoid of a manifold?
entry.summary: The construction (by Kapranov) of the space of infinitesimal paths on a manifold is extended to include higher dimensional infinitesimal objects, encoding contractions of infinitesimal loops. This full infinitesimal groupoid is shown to have the algebra of polyvector fields as its non-linear cohomology.
